145 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
146 /**
147  * @brief MainWindow constructor.
148  * @param parent parent widget.
149  */
150 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget *parent)
151  : MainWindowsNoGUI(parent)
152  , ui(new Ui::MainWindow)
153  , watcher(new QFileSystemWatcher(this))
154  , currentTool(Tool::Arrow)
155  , lastUsedTool(Tool::Arrow)
156  , draftScene(nullptr)
157  , pieceScene(nullptr)
158  , mouseCoordinates(nullptr)
159  , infoToolButton(nullptr)
160  , helpLabel(nullptr)
161  , isInitialized(false)
162  , mChanges(false)
163  , mChangesAsked(true)
164  , patternReadOnly(false)
165  , dialogTable(nullptr)
166  , dialogTool()
167  , historyDialog(nullptr)
168  , fontComboBox(nullptr)
169  , fontSizeComboBox(nullptr)
170  , draftBlockComboBox(nullptr)
171  , draftBlockLabel(nullptr)
172  , mode(Draw::Calculation)
173  , currentBlockIndex(0)
174  , currentToolBoxIndex(0)
175  , isToolOptionsDockVisible(true)
176  , isGroupsDockVisible(true)
177  , isLayoutsDockVisible(false)
178  , isToolboxDockVisible(true)
179  , drawMode(true)
180  , recentFileActs()
181  , separatorAct(nullptr)
182  , leftGoToStage(nullptr)
183  , rightGoToStage(nullptr)
184  , autoSaveTimer(nullptr)
185  , guiEnabled(true)
186  , gradationHeights(nullptr)
187  , gradationSizes(nullptr)
188  , gradationHeightsLabel(nullptr)
189  , gradationSizesLabel(nullptr)
190  , toolProperties(nullptr)
191  , groupsWidget(nullptr)
192  , patternPiecesWidget(nullptr)
193  , lock(nullptr)
194  , zoomScaleSpinBox(nullptr)
195  , m_penToolBar(nullptr)
196  , m_penReset(nullptr)
197  , m_zoomToPointComboBox(nullptr)
198 {
199  for (int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i)
200  {
201  recentFileActs[i] = nullptr;
202  }
203 
204  createActions();
205  initializeScenes();
206 
207  doc = new VPattern(pattern, &mode, draftScene, pieceScene);
208  connect(doc, &VPattern::ClearMainWindow, this, &MainWindow::Clear);
209  connect(doc, &VPattern::patternChanged, this, &MainWindow::patternChangesWereSaved);
210  connect(doc, &VPattern::UndoCommand, this, &MainWindow::fullParseFile);
211  connect(doc, &VPattern::setGuiEnabled, this, &MainWindow::setGuiEnabled);
212  connect(doc, &VPattern::CheckLayout, this, [this]()
213  {
214  if (pattern->DataPieces()->count() == 0)
215  {
216  if(!ui->showDraftMode->isChecked())
217  {
218  showDraftMode(true);
219  }
220  }
221  });
222  connect(doc, &VPattern::setCurrentDraftBlock, this, &MainWindow::changeDraftBlockGlobally);
223  connect(doc, &VPattern::CheckLayout, this, [&](){
224  this->updateZoomToPointComboBox(draftPointNamesList());
225  });
226  qApp->setCurrentDocument(doc);
227  qApp->setCurrentData(pattern);
228 
229  initializeDocksContain();
230  createMenus();
231  initializeDraftToolBar();
232  initializePointNameToolBar();
233  initializeModesToolBar();
234  initializeToolButtons();
235  showMaximized();
236  initPenToolBar();
237 
238  helpLabel = new QLabel(QObject::tr("Create new pattern piece to start working."));
239  ui->statusBar->addWidget(helpLabel);
240 
241  initializeToolsToolBar();
242 
243  connect(qApp->getUndoStack(), &QUndoStack::cleanChanged, this, &MainWindow::patternChangesWereSaved);
244 
245  initializeAutoSave();
246 
247  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
248 
249  ReadSettings();
250  initializeToolBarVisibility();
251 
252  setCurrentFile("");
253  WindowsLocale();
254 
255  connect(ui->listWidget, &QListWidget::currentRowChanged, this, &MainWindow::showLayoutPages);
256 
257  connect(watcher, &QFileSystemWatcher::fileChanged, this, &MainWindow::MeasurementsChanged);
258  connect(qApp, &QApplication::focusChanged, this, [this](QWidget *old, QWidget *now)
259  {
260  if (old == nullptr && isAncestorOf(now) == true)
261  {// focus IN
262  static bool asking = false;
263  if (!asking && mChanges && not mChangesAsked)
264  {
265  asking = true;
266  mChangesAsked = true;
267  const auto answer = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Measurements"),
268  tr("Measurements were changed. Do you want to sync measurements now?"),
269  QMessageBox::Yes|QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes);
270  if (answer == QMessageBox::Yes)
271  {
272  SyncMeasurements();
273  }
274  asking = false;
275  }
276  }
277 
278  // In case we will need it
279  // else if (isAncestorOf(old) == true && now == nullptr)
280  // focus OUT
281  });
282 
283 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
284  // On Mac default icon size is 32x32.
285  ui->draft_ToolBar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
286  ui->mode_ToolBar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
287  ui->edit_Toolbar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
288  ui->zoom_ToolBar->setIconSize(QSize(24, 24));
289 
290  setUnifiedTitleAndToolBarOnMac(true);
291 
292  // Mac OS Dock Menu
293  QMenu *menu = new QMenu(this);
294 
295  QAction *newPattern_Action = menu->addAction(tr("New pattern"));
296  newPattern_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
297  connect(newPattern_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::New);
298 
299  QAction *openPattern_Action = menu->addAction(tr("Open pattern"));
300  openPattern_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
301  connect(openPattern_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Open);
302 
303  QAction *openSeamlyMe_Action = menu->addAction(tr("Create/Edit measurements"));
304  openSeamlyMe_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
305  connect(openSeamlyMe_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::CreateMeasurements);
306 
307  QAction *appPreferences_Action = menu->addAction(tr("Preferences"));
308  appPreferences_Action->setMenuRole(QAction::NoRole);
309  connect(appPreferences_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Preferences);
310 
311  menu->setAsDockMenu();
312 
313 #endif //defined(Q_OS_MAC)
314 }
315 
316 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
317 void MainWindow::addDraftBlock(const QString &blockName)
318 {
319  if (doc->appendDraftBlock(blockName) == false)
320  {
321  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Error creating draft block with the name %s.", qUtf8Printable(blockName));
322  return;
323  }
324 
325  if (draftBlockComboBox->count() == 0)
326  {
327  draftScene->initializeOrigins();
328  draftScene->enablePiecesMode(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getShowControlPoints());
329  pieceScene->initializeOrigins();
330  }
331 
332  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(true);
333  draftBlockComboBox->addItem(blockName);
334 
335  pattern->ClearGObjects();
336  //Create single point
337  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);//hide options previous tool
338  const QString label = doc->GenerateLabel(LabelType::NewPatternPiece);
339  const QPointF startPosition = draftBlockStartPosition();
340  VPointF *point = new VPointF(startPosition.x(), startPosition.y(), label, 5, 10);
341  auto spoint = VToolBasePoint::Create(0, blockName, point, draftScene, doc, pattern, Document::FullParse,
342  Source::FromGui);
343  ui->view->itemClicked(spoint);
344 
345  setToolsEnabled(true);
346  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
347 
348  const qint32 index = draftBlockComboBox->findText(blockName);
349  if (index != -1)
350  { // -1 for not found
351  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
352  }
353  else
354  {
355  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
356  }
357  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(false);
358 
359  // Show best for new PP
360  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(ui->view->scene(), ui->view, spoint);
361  ui->view->zoom100Percent();
362 
363  ui->newDraft_Action->setEnabled(true);
364  helpLabel->setText("");
365  groupsWidget->updateGroups();
366 }
367 
368 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
369 QPointF MainWindow::draftBlockStartPosition() const
370 {
371  const qreal originX = 30.0;
372  const qreal originY = 40.0;
373  const qreal margin = 40.0;
374  if (draftBlockComboBox->count() > 1)
375  {
376  const QRectF rect = draftScene->visibleItemsBoundingRect();
377  if (rect.width() <= rect.height())
378  {
379  return QPointF(rect.width()+margin, originY);
380  }
381  else
382  {
383  return QPointF(originX, rect.height()+margin);
384  }
385  }
386  else
387  {
388  return QPointF(originX, originY);
389  }
390 }
391 
392 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
393 void MainWindow::initializeScenes()
394 {
395  draftScene = new VMainGraphicsScene(this);
396  currentScene = draftScene;
397  qApp->setCurrentScene(&currentScene);
398  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableItemMove, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::EnableItemMove);
399  connect(this, &MainWindow::ItemsSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ItemsSelection);
400 
401  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLabelSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLabelSelection);
402  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnablePointSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::TogglePointSelection);
403  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLineSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLineSelection);
404  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableArcSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleArcSelection);
405  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableElArcSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleElArcSelection);
406  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplineSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplineSelection);
407  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplinePathSelection, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplinePathSelection);
408 
409  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLabelHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLabelHover);
410  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnablePointHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::TogglePointHover);
411  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableLineHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleLineHover);
412  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableArcHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleArcHover);
413  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableElArcHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleElArcHover);
414  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplineHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplineHover);
415  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableSplinePathHover, draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleSplinePathHover);
416 
417  connect(draftScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::mouseMove, this, &MainWindow::MouseMove);
418 
419  pieceScene = new VMainGraphicsScene(this);
420  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableItemMove, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::EnableItemMove);
421 
422  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodeLabelSelection, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodeLabelSelection);
423  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodePointSelection, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodePointSelection);
424  connect(this, &MainWindow::enablePieceSelection, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::togglePieceSelection);
425 
426  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodeLabelHover, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodeLabelHover);
427  connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableNodePointHover, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ToggleNodePointHover);
428  connect(this, &MainWindow::enablePieceHover, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::togglePieceHover);
429 
430  connect(pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::mouseMove, this, &MainWindow::MouseMove);
431 
432  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
433 
434  draftScene->setCurrentTransform(ui->view->transform());
435  pieceScene->setCurrentTransform(ui->view->transform());
436 
437  connect(ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::mouseRelease, this, [this](){EndVisualization(true);});
438  connect(ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::signalZoomScaleChanged, this, &MainWindow::zoomScaleChanged);
439 
440  QSizePolicy policy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
441  policy.setHorizontalStretch(12);
442  ui->view->setSizePolicy(policy);
443  qApp->setSceneView(ui->view);
444 }
445 
446 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
447 QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> MainWindow::openMeasurementFile(const QString &fileName)
448 {
449  QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements;
450  if (fileName.isEmpty())
451  {
452  return measurements;
453  }
454 
455  try
456  {
457  measurements = QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc>(new MeasurementDoc(pattern));
458  measurements->setSize(VContainer::rsize());
459  measurements->setHeight(VContainer::rheight());
460  measurements->setXMLContent(fileName);
461 
462  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Unknown)
463  {
464  VException exception(tr("Measurement file has unknown format."));
465  throw exception;
466  }
467 
468  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
469  {
470  MultiSizeConverter converter(fileName);
471  measurements->setXMLContent(converter.Convert());// Read again after conversion
472  }
473  else
474  {
475  IndividualSizeConverter converter(fileName);
476  measurements->setXMLContent(converter.Convert());// Read again after conversion
477  }
478 
479  if (!measurements->eachKnownNameIsValid())
480  {
481  VException exception(tr("Measurement file contains invalid known measurement(s)."));
482  throw exception;
483  }
484 
485  checkRequiredMeasurements(measurements.data());
486 
487  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
488  {
489  if (measurements->measurementUnits() == Unit::Inch)
490  {
491  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Wrong units.")),
492  qUtf8Printable(tr("Application doesn't support multisize table with inches.")));
493  measurements->clear();
494  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
495  {
496  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
497  }
498  return measurements;
499  }
500  }
501  }
502 
503  catch (VException &exception)
504  {
505  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
506  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
507  measurements->clear();
508  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
509  {
510  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
511  }
512  return measurements;
513  }
514  return measurements;
515 }
516 
517 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
518 bool MainWindow::loadMeasurements(const QString &fileName)
519 {
520  QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements = openMeasurementFile(fileName);
521 
522  if (measurements->isNull())
523  {
524  return false;
525  }
526 
527  if (qApp->patternUnit() == Unit::Inch && measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
528  {
529  qWarning() << tr("Gradation doesn't support inches");
530  return false;
531  }
532 
533  try
534  {
535  qApp->setPatternType(measurements->Type());
536  initializeStatusToolBar();
537 
538  pattern->ClearVariables(VarType::Measurement);
539  measurements->readMeasurements();
540  }
541 
542  catch (VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
543  {
544  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
545  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
546 
547  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
548  {
549  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
550  }
551  return false;
552  }
553 
554  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
555  {
556 
557  VContainer::setSize(UnitConvertor(measurements->BaseSize(), measurements->measurementUnits(),
558  *measurements->GetData()->GetPatternUnit()));
559 
560  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Multisize file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
561 
562  VContainer::setHeight(UnitConvertor(measurements->BaseHeight(), measurements->measurementUnits(),
563  *measurements->GetData()->GetPatternUnit()));
564 
565  doc->SetPatternWasChanged(true);
566  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
567  }
568  else if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Individual)
569  {
570 
571  setSizeHeightForIndividualM();
572 
573  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Individual file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
574  }
575 
576  return true;
577 }
578 
579 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
580 bool MainWindow::updateMeasurements(const QString &fileName, int size, int height)
581 {
582  QSharedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements = openMeasurementFile(fileName);
583 
584  if (measurements->isNull())
585  {
586  return false;
587  }
588 
589  if (qApp->patternType() != measurements->Type())
590  {
591  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Measurement files types have not match.")));
592  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
593  {
594  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
595  }
596  return false;
597  }
598 
599  try
600  {
601  pattern->ClearVariables(VarType::Measurement);
602  measurements->readMeasurements();
603  }
604 
605  catch (VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
606  {
607  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
608  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
609 
610  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
611  {
612  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
613  }
614  return false;
615  }
616 
617  if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
618  {
619  VContainer::setSize(size);
620  VContainer::setHeight(height);
621 
622  doc->SetPatternWasChanged(true);
623  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
624  }
625  else if (measurements->Type() == MeasurementsType::Individual)
626  {
627  setSizeHeightForIndividualM();
628  }
629 
630  return true;
631 }
632 
633 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
634 void MainWindow::checkRequiredMeasurements(const MeasurementDoc *measurements)
635 {
636  auto tempMeasurements = measurements->ListAll();
637  auto docMeasurements = doc->ListMeasurements();
638  const QSet<QString> match = QSet<QString>(docMeasurements.begin(), docMeasurements.end()).
639  subtract(QSet<QString>(tempMeasurements.begin(), tempMeasurements.end()));
640  if (!match.isEmpty())
641  {
642  QList<QString> list = match.values();
643  for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i)
644  {
645  list[i] = qApp->translateVariables()->MToUser(list.at(i));
646  }
647 
648  VException exception(tr("Measurement file doesn't include all the required measurements."));
649  exception.AddMoreInformation(tr("Please provide additional measurements: %1").arg(QStringList(list).join(", ")));
650  throw exception;
651  }
652 }
653 
654 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
655 /**
656  * @brief SetToolButton set tool and show dialog.
657  * @param checked true if tool button checked.
658  * @param t tool type.
659  * @param cursor path tool cursor icon.
660  * @param toolTip first tooltipe.
661  * @param closeDialogSlot function what handle after close dialog.
662  */
663 template <typename Dialog, typename Func>
664 void MainWindow::SetToolButton(bool checked, Tool t, const QString &cursor, const QString &toolTip,
665  Func closeDialogSlot)
666 {
667  if (checked)
668  {
669  CancelTool();
670  emit EnableItemMove(false);
671  currentTool = lastUsedTool = t;
672  auto cursorResource = cursor;
673  if (qApp->devicePixelRatio() >= 2)
674  {
675  // Try to load HiDPI versions of the cursors if available
676  auto cursorHidpiResource = QString(cursor).replace(".png", "@2x.png");
677  if (QFileInfo(cursorResource).exists())
678  {
679  cursorResource = cursorHidpiResource;
680  }
681  }
682  QPixmap pixmap(cursorResource);
683  QCursor cur(pixmap, 2, 2);
684  ui->view->viewport()->setCursor(cur);
685  helpLabel->setText(toolTip);
686  ui->view->setShowToolOptions(false);
687  dialogTool = QSharedPointer<Dialog>(new Dialog(pattern, 0, this));
688 
689  switch(t)
690  {
691  case Tool::ArcIntersectAxis:
692  dialogTool->setWindowTitle("Point - Intersect Arc and Axis");
693  break;
694  case Tool::Midpoint:
695  dialogTool->Build(t);
696  break;
697  case Tool::InternalPath:
698  case Tool::AnchorPoint:
699  case Tool::InsertNodes:
700  dialogTool->SetPiecesList(doc->getActivePatternPieces());
701  break;
702  default:
703  break;
704  }
705 
706  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
707  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
708 
709  connect(scene, &VMainGraphicsScene::ChosenObject, dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::ChosenObject);
710  connect(scene, &VMainGraphicsScene::SelectedObject, dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::SelectedObject);
711  connect(dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::DialogClosed, this, closeDialogSlot);
712  connect(dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::ToolTip, this, &MainWindow::ShowToolTip);
713  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
714  }
715  else
716  {
717  if (QToolButton *tButton = qobject_cast< QToolButton * >(this->sender()))
718  {
719  tButton->setChecked(true);
720  }
721  }
722 }
723 
724 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
725 template <typename Dialog, typename Func, typename Func2>
726 /**
727  * @brief SetToolButtonWithApply set tool and show dialog.
728  * @param checked true if tool button checked.
729  * @param t tool type.
730  * @param cursor path tool cursor icon.
731  * @param toolTip first tooltipe.
732  * @param closeDialogSlot function to handle close of dialog.
733  * @param applyDialogSlot function to handle apply in dialog.
734  */
735 void MainWindow::SetToolButtonWithApply(bool checked, Tool t, const QString &cursor, const QString &toolTip,
736  Func closeDialogSlot, Func2 applyDialogSlot)
737 {
738  if (checked)
739  {
740  SetToolButton<Dialog>(checked, t, cursor, toolTip, closeDialogSlot);
741 
742  connect(dialogTool.data(), &DialogTool::DialogApplied, this, applyDialogSlot);
743  }
744  else
745  {
746  if (QToolButton *tButton = qobject_cast< QToolButton * >(this->sender()))
747  {
748  tButton->setChecked(true);
749  }
750  }
751 }
752 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
753 /**
754  * @brief ClosedDialog handle close dialog
755  * @param result result working dialog.
756  */
757 template <typename DrawTool>
758 void MainWindow::ClosedDialog(int result)
759 {
760  SCASSERT(!dialogTool.isNull())
761  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
762  {
763  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
764  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
765 
766  QGraphicsItem *tool = dynamic_cast<QGraphicsItem *>(DrawTool::Create(dialogTool, scene, doc, pattern));
767  // Do not check for nullptr! See issue #719.
768  ui->view->itemClicked(tool);
769  }
770  handleArrowTool(true);
771 }
772 
773 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
774 /**
775  * @brief ClosedDialogWithApply handle close dialog that has apply button
776  * @param result result working dialog.
777  */
778 template <typename DrawTool>
779 void MainWindow::ClosedDialogWithApply(int result, VMainGraphicsScene *scene)
780 {
781  SCASSERT(!dialogTool.isNull())
782  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
783  {
784  ApplyDialog<DrawTool>(scene);
785  }
786  // If before Cancel was used Apply we have an item
787  DrawTool *vtool = qobject_cast<DrawTool *>(dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool());// Don't check for nullptr here
788  if (dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool() != nullptr)
789  {
790  SCASSERT(vtool != nullptr)
791  vtool->DialogLinkDestroy();
792  connect(vtool, &DrawTool::ToolTip, this, &MainWindow::ShowToolTip);
793  }
794  handleArrowTool(true);
795  ui->view->itemClicked(vtool);// Don't check for nullptr here
796  // If insert not to the end of file call lite parse
797  if (doc->getCursor() > 0)
798  {
799  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
800  if (historyDialog)
801  {
802  historyDialog->updateHistory();
803  }
804  }
805 }
806 
807 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
808 /**
809  * @brief ApplyDialog handle apply in dialog
810  */
811 template <typename DrawTool>
812 void MainWindow::ApplyDialog(VMainGraphicsScene *scene)
813 {
814  SCASSERT(!dialogTool.isNull())
815 
816  // Only create tool if not already created with apply
817  if (dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool() == nullptr)
818  {
819  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
820 
821  dialogTool->SetAssociatedTool(DrawTool::Create(dialogTool, scene, doc, pattern));
822  }
823  else
824  { // Or update associated tool with data
825  DrawTool * vtool = qobject_cast<DrawTool *>(dialogTool->GetAssociatedTool());
826  SCASSERT(vtool != nullptr)
827  vtool->FullUpdateFromGuiApply();
828  }
829 }
830 
831 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
832 template <typename DrawTool>
833 void MainWindow::ClosedDrawDialogWithApply(int result)
834 {
835  ClosedDialogWithApply<DrawTool>(result, draftScene);
836 }
837 
838 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
839 template <typename DrawTool>
840 void MainWindow::ApplyDrawDialog()
841 {
842  ApplyDialog<DrawTool>(draftScene);
843 }
844 
845 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
846 template <typename DrawTool>
847 void MainWindow::ClosedPiecesDialogWithApply(int result)
848 {
849  ClosedDialogWithApply<DrawTool>(result, pieceScene);
850  if (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0)
851  {
852  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(true);
853  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setEnabled(true);
854  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setEnabled(true);
855  ui->importImage_ToolButton->setEnabled(true);
856  ui->anchorPoint_Action->setEnabled(true);
857  ui->internalPath_Action->setEnabled(true);
858  ui->images_Action->setEnabled(true);
859  ui->anchorPoint_Action->setEnabled(true);
860  ui->internalPath_Action->setEnabled(true);
861  ui->insertNodes_Action->setEnabled(true);
862  }
863 }
864 
865 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
866 template <typename DrawTool>
867 void MainWindow::applyPiecesDialog()
868 {
869  ApplyDialog<DrawTool>(pieceScene);
870 }
871 
872 //Points
873 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
874 void MainWindow::handleMidpointTool(bool checked)
875 {
876  ToolSelectPointByRelease();
877  // Reuse DialogAlongLine and VToolAlongLine but with different cursor
878  SetToolButtonWithApply<DialogAlongLine>
879  (
880  checked,
881  Tool::Midpoint,
882  ":/cursor/midpoint_cursor.png",
883  tr("<b>Tool::Point - Midpoint on Line</b>: Select first point"),
884  &MainWindow::ClosedDrawDialogWithApply<VToolAlongLine>,
885  &MainWindow::ApplyDrawDialog<VToolAlongLine>
886  );
887 }

1346  tr("<b>Tool::Point - Intersect Circle and Tangent:</b> Select point on tangent"),
1347  &MainWindow::ClosedDrawDialogWithApply<IntersectCircleTangentTool>,
1348  &MainWindow::ApplyDrawDialog<IntersectCircleTangentTool>
1349  );
1350 }

1403 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1404 void MainWindow::handleGroupTool(bool checked)
1405 {
1406  ToolSelectGroupObjects();
1407  const QString tooltip = tr("<b>Tool::Operations - Create Group:</b> Select one or more objects -"
1408  " Hold <b>%1</b> for multiple selection, "
1409  "Press <b>ENTER</b> to finish group creation ")
1410  .arg(QCoreApplication::translate(strQShortcut.toUtf8().constData(),
1411  strCtrl.toUtf8().constData()));
1412  SetToolButton<AddToGroupDialog>
1413  (
1414  checked,
1415  Tool::Group,
1416  ":/cursor/group_cursor.png",
1417  tooltip,
1418  &MainWindow::ClosedEditGroupDialog
1419  );
1420 }
1421 
1422 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1423 void MainWindow::ClosedEditGroupDialog(int result)
1424 {
1425  SCASSERT(dialogTool != nullptr)
1426  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
1427  {
1428  QSharedPointer<AddToGroupDialog> dialog = dialogTool.objectCast<AddToGroupDialog>();
1429  SCASSERT(dialog != nullptr)
1430 
1431  QString gName = dialog->getName();
1432  QMap<quint32, quint32> gData = dialog->getGroupData();
1433  QDomElement group = doc->addGroupItems(gName, gData);
1434  if (group.isNull())
1435  {
1436  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Add Group Objects"), tr("Group is Locked. Unlock to add objects"),
1437  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
1438  }
1439  }
1440  handleArrowTool(true);
1441 }
1442

1626 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1627 void MainWindow::ClosedInsertNodesDialog(int result)
1628 {
1629  SCASSERT(dialogTool != nullptr);
1630  if (result == QDialog::Accepted)
1631  {
1632  QSharedPointer<InsertNodesDialog> tool = dialogTool.objectCast<InsertNodesDialog>();
1633  SCASSERT(tool != nullptr)
1634  PatternPieceTool::insertNodes(tool->getNodes(), tool->getPieceId(), pieceScene, pattern, doc);
1635  }
1636  handleArrowTool(true);
1637  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
1638 }
1639 
1640 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1641 void MainWindow::handleImportImage()
1642 {
1643  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Add Image");
1644  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->backgroundImage_Page);
1645  ui->importImage_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
1646 
1647  QString filename = getImageFilename();
1648  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Image filename: %s", qUtf8Printable(filename));
1649 
1650  DraftImage image;
1651  QFileInfo f(filename);
1652  if (filename.isEmpty())
1653  {
1654  ui->importImage_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
1655  return;
1656  }
1657  image.name = f.baseName();
1658  image.filename = filename;
1659  image.units = qApp->patternUnit();
1660 
1661  addImage(image);
1662 }
1663 
1664 void MainWindow::addImage(DraftImage image)
1665 {
1666  static bool firstImportImage = false;
1667  QImageReader imageReader(image.filename);
1668 
1669  image.id = VContainer::getNextId();
1670 
1671  if(!imageReader.canRead())
1672  {
1673  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Can't read image");
1674  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Can't read image"), tr("Could not read the image.") + "\n" + tr("It may be corrupted..."), QMessageBox::Ok);
1675  return;
1676  }
1677 
1678  image.pixmap = QPixmap::fromImageReader(&imageReader);
1679 
1680  if(image.pixmap.isNull())
1681  {
1682  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Can't read image");
1683  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Can't read image"), tr("Could not read the image.") + "\n" + tr("It may be corrupted or empty..."), QMessageBox::Ok);
1684  return;
1685  }
1686 
1687  if (image.width == 0 || image.height == 0)
1688  {
1689  image.width = image.pixmap.width();
1690  image.height = image.pixmap.height();
1691  }
1692 
1693  ImageItem *item = new ImageItem(doc, image);
1694  doc->addBackgroundImage(image.id, item);
1695  draftScene->addItem(item);
1696  //Need error dialog
1697 
1698  //connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableImageSelection, item, &ImageItem::enableSelection);
1699  //connect(this, &MainWindow::EnableImageHover, item, &ImageItem::enableHovering);
1700 
1701  connect(item, &ImageItem::deleteImage, this, &MainWindow::handleDeleteImage);
1702  //connect(item, &ImageItem::imageSelected, this, &MainWindow::handleImageSelected);
1703  connect(item, &ImageItem::setStatusMessage, this, &MainWindow::setStatusMessage);
1704 
1705  ui->importImage_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
1706 
1707  if(!firstImportImage)
1708  {
1709  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Inside first import image");
1710  InfoUnsavedImages(&firstImportImage);
1711  }
1712 }
1713 
1714 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1715 void MainWindow::handleDeleteImage(quint32 id)
1716 {
1717  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "delete Image");
1718  bool deleteConfirmed = true;
1719 
1720  if (qApp->Settings()->getConfirmItemDelete())
1721  {
1722  Utils::CheckableMessageBox msgBox(qApp->getMainWindow());
1723  msgBox.setWindowTitle(tr("Confirm deletion"));
1724  msgBox.setText(tr("Do you really want to delete?"));
1725  msgBox.setStandardButtons(QDialogButtonBox::Yes | QDialogButtonBox::No);
1726  msgBox.setDefaultButton(QDialogButtonBox::No);
1727  msgBox.setIconPixmap(QApplication::style()->standardIcon(QStyle::SP_MessageBoxQuestion).pixmap(32, 32) );
1728 
1729  int dialogResult = msgBox.exec();
1730 
1731  if (dialogResult != QDialog::Accepted)
1732  {
1733  deleteConfirmed = false;
1734  }
1735 
1736  qApp->Settings()->setConfirmItemDelete(not msgBox.isChecked());
1737 
1738  }
1739 
1740  if (deleteConfirmed)
1741  {
1742  ImageItem *item = doc->getBackgroundImage(id);
1743  if (item)
1744  {
1745  doc->removeBackgroundImage(id);
1746  item->deleteImageItem();
1747  }
1748  }
1749 }
1750 
1751 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1752 void MainWindow::handleImageSelected(quint32 id)
1753 {
1754  ImageItem *item = doc->getBackgroundImage(id);
1755  if (item)
1756  {
1757  // May be useful in the development of the background-image feature
1758  }
1759 }
1760 
1761 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1762 void MainWindow::setStatusMessage(QString message)
1763 {
1764  helpLabel->setText(message);
1765 }
1766

1771 }

1775 {
1776  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "align Image");
1777 }

1779 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1783 }
1784 
1785 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1786 void MainWindow::updateImage(DraftImage image)
1787 {
1788  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Id = %d", image.id);
1789  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Name = %s", qUtf8Printable(image.name));
1790  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Filename = %s", qUtf8Printable(image.filename));
1791  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "lock Image = %s", image.locked ? "True" : "False");
1792  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Anchor = %d", static_cast<int>(image.anchor));
1793  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Xpos = %f", image.xPos);
1794  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "YPos = %f", image.yPos);
1795  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Width = %f", image.width);
1796  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Height = %f", image.height);
1797  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "lock Image Aspect = %s", image.aspectLocked ? "True" : "False");
1798  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Units = %d", static_cast<int>(image.units));
1799  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Rotation = %f", image.rotation);
1800  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Visible = %s", image.visible ? "True" : "False");
1801  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Opacity = %f", image.opacity);
1802  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Order = %d\n", static_cast<int>(image.order));
1803 
1804  ImageItem *item = static_cast<ImageItem *>(qApp->getCurrentScene()->focusItem());
1805  if (item)
1806  {
1807  item->setImage(image);
1808  }
1809 }
1810 
1811 
1812 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1813 QString MainWindow::getImageFilename()
1814 {
1815  const QString filter = tr("Images") + QLatin1String(" (*.bmp *.jpg *.png *.svg *.tf);;") +
1816  "BMP" + QLatin1String(" (*.bmp);;") +
1817  "JPG" + QLatin1String(" (*.jpg);;") +
1818  "PNG" + QLatin1String(" (*.png);;") +
1819  "SVG" + QLatin1String(" (*.svg);;") +
1820  "TIF" + QLatin1String(" (*.tf)");
1821 
1822  const QString path = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getImageFilePath();
1823 
1824  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
1825  QDir directory(path);
1826  if (!directory.exists())
1827  {
1828  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
1829  }
1830 
1831  const QString filename = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open Image File"), path, filter, nullptr,
1832  QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog);
1833 
1834  return filename;
1835 }
1836

1852  &MainWindow::closeUnionDialog
1853  );
1854 }

1865 }

1936 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1937 /**
1938  * @brief showEvent handle after show window.
1939  * @param event show event.
1940  */
1941 void MainWindow::showEvent(QShowEvent *event)
1942 {
1943  QMainWindow::showEvent(event);
1944  if (event->spontaneous())
1945  {
1946  return;
1947  }
1948 
1949  if (isInitialized)
1950  {
1951  return;
1952  }
1953  // do your initialize stuff here
1954 
1955  MinimumScrollBar();
1956 
1957  isInitialized = true;//first show windows are held
1958 }
1959 
1960 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1961 void MainWindow::changeEvent(QEvent *event)
1962 {
1963  if (event->type() == QEvent::LanguageChange)
1964  {
1965  // retranslate designer form (single inheritance approach)
1966  ui->retranslateUi(this);
1967  undoAction->setText(tr("&Undo"));
1968  redoAction->setText(tr("&Redo"));
1969  helpLabel->setText(QObject::tr("Changes applied."));
1970  draftBlockLabel->setText(tr("Draft Block:"));
1971 
1972  if (mode == Draw::Calculation)
1973  {
1974  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Group Manager"));
1975  }
1976  else
1977  {
1978  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Pattern Pieces"));
1979  }
1980 
1981  UpdateWindowTitle();
1982  initPenToolBar();
1983  initBasePointComboBox();
1984  emit pieceScene->LanguageChanged();
1985  }
1986  // remember to call base class implementation
1987  QMainWindow::changeEvent(event);
1988 }
1989 
1990 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1991 /**
1992  * @brief closeEvent handle after close window.
1993  * @param event close event.
1994  */
1995 void MainWindow::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event)
1996 {
1997  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Closing main window");
1998  if (MaybeSave())
1999  {
2000  FileClosedCorrect();
2001 
2002  event->accept();
2003  QApplication::closeAllWindows();
2004  }
2005  else
2006  {
2007  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Closing canceled.");
2008  event->ignore();
2009  }
2010 }
2011 
2012 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2013 void MainWindow::customEvent(QEvent *event)
2014 {
2015  if (event->type() == UNDO_EVENT)
2016  {
2017  qApp->getUndoStack()->undo();
2018  }
2019 }
2020 
2021 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2022 void MainWindow::CleanLayout()
2023 {
2024  qDeleteAll (scenes);
2025  scenes.clear();
2026  shadows.clear();
2027  papers.clear();
2028  ui->listWidget->clear();
2029  groupsWidget->clear();
2030  SetLayoutModeActions();
2031 }
2032 
2033 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2034 void MainWindow::PrepareSceneList()
2035 {
2036  for (int i=1; i<=scenes.size(); ++i)
2037  {
2038  QListWidgetItem *item = new QListWidgetItem(ScenePreview(i-1), QString::number(i));
2039  ui->listWidget->addItem(item);
2040  }
2041 
2042  if (!scenes.isEmpty())
2043  {
2044  ui->listWidget->setCurrentRow(0);
2045  SetLayoutModeActions();
2046  }
2047 }
2048 
2049 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2050 void MainWindow::exportToCSVData(const QString &fileName, const DialogExportToCSV &dialog)
2051 {
2052  QxtCsvModel csv;
2053 
2054  csv.insertColumn(0);
2055  csv.insertColumn(1);
2056  csv.insertColumn(2);
2057 
2058  if (dialog.WithHeader())
2059  {
2060  csv.setHeaderText(0, tr("Name"));
2061  csv.setHeaderText(1, tr("The calculated value"));
2062  csv.setHeaderText(2, tr("Formula"));
2063  }
2064 
2065  const QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<CustomVariable>> customVariables = pattern->variablesData();
2066  QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<CustomVariable>>::const_iterator i;
2067  QMap<quint32, QString> map;
2068  //Sorting QHash by id
2069  for (i = customVariables.constBegin(); i != customVariables.constEnd(); ++i)
2070  {
2071  QSharedPointer<CustomVariable> variable = i.value();
2072  map.insert(variable->getIndex(), i.key());
2073  }
2074 
2075  qint32 currentRow = -1;
2076  QMapIterator<quint32, QString> iMap(map);
2077  while (iMap.hasNext())
2078  {
2079  iMap.next();
2080  QSharedPointer<CustomVariable> variable = customVariables.value(iMap.value());
2081  currentRow++;
2082 
2083  csv.insertRow(currentRow);
2084  csv.setText(currentRow, 0, variable->GetName()); // name
2085  csv.setText(currentRow, 1, qApp->LocaleToString(*variable->GetValue())); // calculated value
2086 
2087  QString formula;
2088  try
2089  {
2090  formula = qApp->translateVariables()->FormulaToUser(variable->GetFormula(), qApp->Settings()->getOsSeparator());
2091  }
2092  catch (qmu::QmuParserError &error)
2093  {
2094  Q_UNUSED(error)
2095  formula = variable->GetFormula();
2096  }
2097 
2098  csv.setText(currentRow, 2, formula); // formula
2099  }
2100 
2101  csv.toCSV(fileName, dialog.WithHeader(), dialog.Separator(), QTextCodec::codecForMib(dialog.SelectedMib()));
2102 }
2103 
2104 void MainWindow::handleExportToCSV()
2105 {
2106  QString file = tr("untitled");
2107  if(!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
2108  {
2109  QString filePath = qApp->getFilePath();
2110  file = QFileInfo(filePath).baseName();
2111  }
2112  exportToCSV(file);
2113 }
2114 
2115 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2116 void MainWindow::LoadIndividual()
2117 {
2118  const QString filter = tr("Individual measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smisExt +
2119  QLatin1String(" *.") + vitExt + QLatin1String(")");
2120 
2121  //Use standard path to individual measurements
2122  const QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getIndividualSizePath();
2123 
2124  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
2125  QDir directory(dir);
2126 
2127  if (!directory.exists())
2128  {
2129  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
2130  }
2131 
2132  const QString filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
2133  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
2134 
2135 
2136  if (!filename.isEmpty())
2137  {
2138  if (loadMeasurements(filename))
2139  {
2140  if (!doc->MPath().isEmpty())
2141  {
2142  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
2143  }
2144 
2145  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Individual file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(filename));
2146 
2147  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(true);
2148 
2149  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), filename));
2150  watcher->addPath(filename);
2151  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
2152 
2153  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(true);
2154  helpLabel->setText(tr("Measurements loaded"));
2155  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
2156 
2157  UpdateWindowTitle();
2158  }
2159  }
2160 
2161  if (usedNotExistedDir)
2162  {
2163  QDir directory(dir);
2164  directory.rmpath(".");
2165  }
2166 }
2167 
2168 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2169 void MainWindow::LoadMultisize()
2170 {
2171  const QString filter = tr("Multisize measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smmsExt +
2172  QLatin1String(" *.") + vstExt + QLatin1String(")");
2173 
2174  //Use standard path to multisize measurements
2175  QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getMultisizePath();
2176  dir = VCommonSettings::prepareMultisizeTables(dir);
2177 
2178  const QString filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
2179  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
2180 
2181  if (!filename.isEmpty())
2182  {
2183  QString hText;
2184  if (!gradationHeights.isNull())
2185  {
2186  hText = gradationHeights->currentText();
2187  }
2188  QString sText;
2189  if (!gradationSizes.isNull())
2190  {
2191  sText = gradationSizes->currentText();
2192  }
2193 
2194  if(loadMeasurements(filename))
2195  {
2196  if (!doc->MPath().isEmpty())
2197  {
2198  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
2199  }
2200 
2201  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Multisize file %s was loaded.", qUtf8Printable(filename));
2202 
2203  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(true);
2204 
2205  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), filename));
2206  watcher->addPath(filename);
2207  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
2208 
2209  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(true);
2210  helpLabel->setText(tr("Measurements loaded"));
2211  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
2212 
2213  UpdateWindowTitle();
2214 
2215  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2216  {
2217  if (!hText.isEmpty() && not gradationHeights.isNull())
2218  {
2219  gradationHeights->setCurrentText(hText);
2220  }
2221 
2222  if (!sText.isEmpty() && not gradationSizes.isNull())
2223  {
2224  gradationSizes->setCurrentText(sText);
2225  }
2226  }
2227  }
2228  }
2229 }
2230 
2231 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2232 void MainWindow::UnloadMeasurements()
2233 {
2234  if (doc->MPath().isEmpty())
2235  {
2236  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setDisabled(true);
2237  return;
2238  }
2239 
2240  if (doc->ListMeasurements().isEmpty())
2241  {
2242  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
2243  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2244  {
2245  initializeStatusToolBar();
2246  }
2247  qApp->setPatternType(MeasurementsType::Unknown);
2248  doc->SetMPath(QString());
2249  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
2250  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
2251  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(false);
2252  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setDisabled(true);
2253  helpLabel->setText(tr("Measurements unloaded"));
2254 
2255  UpdateWindowTitle();
2256  }
2257  else
2258  {
2259  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s",
2260  qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't unload measurements. Some of them are used in the pattern.")));
2261  }
2262 }
2263 
2264 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2265 void MainWindow::ShowMeasurements()
2266 {
2267  if (!doc->MPath().isEmpty())
2268  {
2269  const QString absoluteMPath = AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath());
2270 
2271  QStringList arguments;
2272  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2273  {
2274  arguments = QStringList()
2275  << absoluteMPath
2276  << "-u"
2277  << UnitsToStr(qApp->patternUnit())
2278  << "-e"
2279  << QString().setNum(static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(VContainer::height(), doc->measurementUnits(), Unit::Cm)))
2280  << "-s"
2281  << QString().setNum(static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(VContainer::size(), doc->measurementUnits(), Unit::Cm)));
2282  }
2283  else
2284  {
2285  arguments = QStringList() << absoluteMPath
2286  << "-u"
2287  << UnitsToStr(qApp->patternUnit());
2288  }
2289 
2290  if (isNoScaling)
2291  {
2292  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
2293  }
2294 
2295  const QString seamlyme = qApp->seamlyMeFilePath();
2296  const QString workingDirectory = QFileInfo(seamlyme).absoluteDir().absolutePath();
2297  QProcess::startDetached(seamlyme, arguments, workingDirectory);
2298  }
2299  else
2300  {
2301  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(false);
2302  }
2303 }
2304 
2305 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2306 void MainWindow::MeasurementsChanged(const QString &path)
2307 {
2308  mChanges = false;
2309  QFileInfo checkFile(path);
2310  if (checkFile.exists())
2311  {
2312  mChanges = true;
2313  mChangesAsked = false;
2314  }
2315  else
2316  {
2317  for(int i=0; i<=1000; i=i+10)
2318  {
2319  if (checkFile.exists())
2320  {
2321  mChanges = true;
2322  mChangesAsked = false;
2323  break;
2324  }
2325  else
2326  {
2327  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(10));
2328  }
2329  }
2330  }
2331 
2332  UpdateWindowTitle();
2333  ui->syncMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(mChanges);
2334 }
2335 
2336 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2337 void MainWindow::SyncMeasurements()
2338 {
2339  if (mChanges)
2340  {
2341  const QString path = AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath());
2342  if(updateMeasurements(path, static_cast<int>(VContainer::size()), static_cast<int>(VContainer::height())))
2343  {
2344  if (!watcher->files().contains(path))
2345  {
2346  watcher->addPath(path);
2347  }
2348  const QString msg = tr("Measurements have been synced");
2349  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(msg));
2350  helpLabel->setText(msg);
2351  VWidgetPopup::PopupMessage(this, msg);
2352  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
2353  mChanges = false;
2354  mChangesAsked = true;
2355  UpdateWindowTitle();
2356  ui->syncMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(mChanges);
2357  }
2358  else
2359  {
2360  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't sync measurements.")));
2361  }
2362  }
2363 }
2364 
2365 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2366 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
2367 void MainWindow::OpenAt(QAction *where)
2368 {
2369  const QString path = qApp->getFilePath().left(qApp->getFilePath().indexOf(where->text())) + where->text();
2370  if (path == qApp->getFilePath())
2371  {
2372  return;
2373  }
2374  QProcess process;
2375  process.start(QStringLiteral("/usr/bin/open"), QStringList() << path, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
2376  process.waitForFinished();
2377 }
2378 #endif //defined(Q_OS_MAC)
2379 
2380 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2381 /**
2382  * @brief initializeStatusToolBar initialize horizontal bar for presenting status information
2383  */
2384 void MainWindow::initializeStatusToolBar()
2385 {
2386  if (!mouseCoordinates.isNull())
2387  {
2388  delete mouseCoordinates;
2389  }
2390  if (!infoToolButton.isNull())
2391  {
2392  delete infoToolButton;
2393  }
2394  if (!gradationHeights.isNull())
2395  {
2396  delete gradationHeights;
2397  }
2398  if (!gradationSizes.isNull())
2399  {
2400  delete gradationSizes;
2401  }
2402  if (!gradationHeightsLabel.isNull())
2403  {
2404  delete gradationHeightsLabel;
2405  }
2406  if (!gradationSizesLabel.isNull())
2407  {
2408  delete gradationSizesLabel;
2409  }
2410 
2411  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
2412  {
2413  const QStringList listHeights = MeasurementVariable::ListHeights(doc->GetGradationHeights(), qApp->patternUnit());
2414  const QStringList listSizes = MeasurementVariable::ListSizes(doc->GetGradationSizes(), qApp->patternUnit());
2415 
2416  gradationHeightsLabel = new QLabel(tr("Height:"), this);
2417  gradationHeights = SetGradationList(gradationHeightsLabel, listHeights);
2418 
2419  // set default height
2420  SetDefaultHeight();
2421 
2422  connect(gradationHeights.data(), static_cast<void (QComboBox::*)(int)>(&QComboBox::currentIndexChanged),
2423  this, &MainWindow::ChangedHeight);
2424 
2425  gradationSizesLabel = new QLabel(tr("Size:"), this);
2426  gradationSizes = SetGradationList(gradationSizesLabel, listSizes);
2427 
2428  // set default size
2429  SetDefaultSize();
2430 
2431  connect(gradationSizes.data(), static_cast<void (QComboBox::*)(int)>(&QComboBox::currentIndexChanged),
2432  this, &MainWindow::ChangedSize);
2433 
2434  }
2435 
2436  mouseCoordinates = new MouseCoordinates(qApp->patternUnit());
2437  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget((mouseCoordinates));
2438 
2439  infoToolButton = new QToolButton();
2440  infoToolButton->setDefaultAction(ui->documentInfo_Action);
2441  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget((infoToolButton));
2442 }
2443 
2444 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2445 QComboBox *MainWindow::SetGradationList(QLabel *label, const QStringList &list)
2446 {
2447  QComboBox *comboBox = new QComboBox(this);
2448  comboBox->addItems(list);
2449  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget(label);
2450  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget(comboBox);
2451 
2452  return comboBox;
2453 }
2454 
2455 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2456 void MainWindow::initializeModesToolBar()
2457 {
2458  leftGoToStage = new QLabel(this);
2459  leftGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/fast_forward_left_to_right_arrow.png"));
2460  ui->mode_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->pieceMode_Action, leftGoToStage);
2461 
2462  rightGoToStage = new QLabel(this);
2463  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/left_to_right_arrow.png"));
2464  ui->mode_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->layoutMode_Action, rightGoToStage);
2465 }

2468 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2469 /**
2470  * @brief initializePointNameToolBar enable Point Name toolbar.
2471  */
2472 void MainWindow::initializePointNameToolBar()
2473 {
2474  fontComboBox = new QFontComboBox ;
2475  fontComboBox->setCurrentFont(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameFont());
2476  ui->pointName_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->showPointNames_Action,fontComboBox);
2477  fontComboBox->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
2478  fontComboBox->setEnabled(true);
2479 
2480  connect(fontComboBox, static_cast<void (QFontComboBox::*)(const QFont &)>(&QFontComboBox::currentFontChanged),
2481  this, [this](QFont font)
2482  {
2483  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameFont(font);
2484  upDateScenes();
2485  });
2486 
2487  fontSizeComboBox = new QComboBox ;
2488  ui->pointName_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->showPointNames_Action,fontSizeComboBox);
2489  fontSizeComboBox->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
2490  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("6", QVariant(static_cast<int>(6)));
2491  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("7", QVariant(static_cast<int>(7)));
2492  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("8", QVariant(static_cast<int>(8)));
2493  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("9", QVariant(static_cast<int>(9)));
2494  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("10", QVariant(static_cast<int>(10)));
2495  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("11", QVariant(static_cast<int>(11)));
2496  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("12", QVariant(static_cast<int>(12)));
2497  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("13", QVariant(static_cast<int>(13)));
2498  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("14", QVariant(static_cast<int>(14)));
2499  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("15", QVariant(static_cast<int>(15)));
2500  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("16", QVariant(static_cast<int>(16)));
2501  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("18", QVariant(static_cast<int>(18)));
2502  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("20", QVariant(static_cast<int>(20)));
2503  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("22", QVariant(static_cast<int>(22)));
2504  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("24", QVariant(static_cast<int>(24)));
2505  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("26", QVariant(static_cast<int>(26)));
2506  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("28", QVariant(static_cast<int>(28)));
2507  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("32", QVariant(static_cast<int>(32)));
2508  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("36", QVariant(static_cast<int>(36)));
2509  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("40", QVariant(static_cast<int>(40)));
2510  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("44", QVariant(static_cast<int>(44)));
2511  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("48", QVariant(static_cast<int>(48)));
2512  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("54", QVariant(static_cast<int>(54)));
2513  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("60", QVariant(static_cast<int>(60)));
2514  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("66", QVariant(static_cast<int>(66)));
2515  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("72", QVariant(static_cast<int>(72)));
2516  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("80", QVariant(static_cast<int>(80)));
2517  fontSizeComboBox->addItem("96", QVariant(static_cast<int>(96)));
2518 
2519  int index = fontSizeComboBox->findData(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameSize());
2520  if (index < 0 || index > 28)
2521  {
2522  index = 18;
2523  }
2524  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
2525 
2526  connect(fontSizeComboBox, &QComboBox::currentTextChanged, this, [this](QString text)
2527  {
2528  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameSize(text.toInt());
2529  upDateScenes();
2530  });
2531  fontSizeComboBox->setEnabled(true);
2532 
2533  basePointComboBox = new QComboBox ;
2534  ui->pointName_ToolBar->addWidget(basePointComboBox);
2535  initBasePointComboBox();
2536  basePointComboBox->setEnabled(true);
2537 
2538  connect(basePointComboBox, &QComboBox::currentTextChanged, this, &MainWindow::basePointChanged);
2539 }
2540 
2541 
2542 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2543 /**
2544  * @brief initBasePointComboBox fills basePointComboBox.
2545  */
2546 void MainWindow::initBasePointComboBox()
2547 {
2548  basePointComboBox->clear();
2549  basePointComboBox->addItem(tr("Default"));
2550  basePointComboBox->addItems(doc->GetCurrentAlphabet()); // These items are based on the Point name language
2551  basePointComboBox->setToolTip(tr("Base name used for new points.\nPress enter to temporarily add it to the list."));
2552  basePointComboBox->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
2553  basePointComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
2554  basePointComboBox->setEditable(true);
2555  basePointComboBox->setInsertPolicy(QComboBox::InsertAtTop);
2556 }
