2558 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2559 /**
2560  * @brief initializeDraftToolBar enable draw toolbar.
2561  */
2562 void MainWindow::initializeDraftToolBar()
2563 {
2564  draftBlockLabel = new QLabel(tr("Draft Block:"));
2565  ui->draft_ToolBar->addWidget(draftBlockLabel);
2566 
2567  // By using Qt UI Designer we can't add QComboBox to toolbar
2568  draftBlockComboBox = new QComboBox;
2569  ui->draft_ToolBar->addWidget(draftBlockComboBox);
2570  draftBlockComboBox->setSizeAdjustPolicy(QComboBox::AdjustToContents);
2571  draftBlockComboBox->setEnabled(false);
2572 
2573  connect(draftBlockComboBox, static_cast<void (QComboBox::*)(int)>(&QComboBox::currentIndexChanged),
2574  this, [this](int index){changeDraftBlock(index);});
2575 
2576  connect(ui->renameDraft_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
2577  {
2578  const QString activeDraftBlock = doc->getActiveDraftBlockName();
2579  const QString draftBlockName = createDraftBlockName(activeDraftBlock);
2580  if (draftBlockName.isEmpty())
2581  {
2582  return;
2583  }
2584  RenameDraftBlock *draftBlock = new RenameDraftBlock(doc, draftBlockName, draftBlockComboBox);
2585  qApp->getUndoStack()->push(draftBlock);
2586  fullParseFile();
2587  });
2588 }
2589 
2590 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2591 void MainWindow::initializeToolsToolBar()
2592 {
2593  /*First we will try use Standard Shortcuts from Qt, but because keypad "-" and "+" not the same keys like in main
2594  keypad, shortcut Ctrl+"-" or "+" from keypad will not working with standard shortcut (QKeySequence::ZoomIn or
2595  QKeySequence::ZoomOut). For example "+" is Qt::Key_Plus + Qt::KeypadModifier for keypad.
2596  Also for me don't work Qt:CTRL and work Qt::ControlModifier.*/
2597 
2598  QList<QKeySequence> zoomInShortcuts;
2599  zoomInShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(QKeySequence::ZoomIn));
2600  zoomInShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Plus + Qt::KeypadModifier));
2601  ui->zoomIn_Action->setShortcuts(zoomInShortcuts);
2602  connect(ui->zoomIn_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoomIn);
2603 
2604  QList<QKeySequence> zoomOutShortcuts;
2605  zoomOutShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(QKeySequence::ZoomOut));
2606  zoomOutShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Minus + Qt::KeypadModifier));
2607  ui->zoomOut_Action->setShortcuts(zoomOutShortcuts);
2608  connect(ui->zoomOut_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoomOut);
2609 
2610  QList<QKeySequence> zoom100PercentShortcuts;
2611  zoom100PercentShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_0));
2612  zoom100PercentShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_0 + Qt::KeypadModifier));
2613  ui->zoom100Percent_Action->setShortcuts(zoom100PercentShortcuts);
2614  connect(ui->zoom100Percent_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoom100Percent);
2615 
2616  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToFitShortcuts;
2617  zoomToFitShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Equal));
2618  ui->zoomToFit_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToFitShortcuts);
2619  connect(ui->zoomToFit_Action, &QAction::triggered, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::zoomToFit);
2620 
2621  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToSelectedShortcuts;
2622  zoomToSelectedShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Right));
2623  ui->zoomToSelected_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToSelectedShortcuts);
2624  connect(ui->zoomToSelected_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::zoomToSelected);
2625 
2626  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToPreviousShortcuts;
2627  zoomToPreviousShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Left));
2628  ui->zoomToPrevious_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToPreviousShortcuts);
2629  connect(ui->zoomToPrevious_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::zoomToPrevious);
2630 
2631  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToAreaShortcuts;
2632  zoomToAreaShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_A));
2633  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToAreaShortcuts);
2634  connect(ui->zoomToArea_Action, &QAction::toggled, this, &MainWindow::zoomToArea);
2635 
2636  resetPanShortcuts();
2637  connect(ui->zoomPan_Action, &QAction::toggled, this, &MainWindow::zoomPan);
2638 
2639  QList<QKeySequence> zoomToPointShortcuts;
2640  zoomToPointShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::AltModifier + Qt::Key_P));
2641  ui->zoomToPoint_Action->setShortcuts(zoomToPointShortcuts);
2642  connect(ui->zoomToPoint_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showZoomToPointDialog);
2643 
2644  m_zoomToPointComboBox = new QComboBox(ui->zoom_ToolBar);
2645  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setEnabled(false);
2646  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setToolTip(ui->zoomToPoint_Action->toolTip());
2647  ui->zoom_ToolBar->addWidget(m_zoomToPointComboBox);
2648  connect(m_zoomToPointComboBox, &QComboBox::currentTextChanged, this, &MainWindow::zoomToPoint);
2649 
2650  if (zoomScaleSpinBox != nullptr)
2651  {
2652  delete zoomScaleSpinBox;
2653  }
2654  zoomScaleSpinBox = new QDoubleSpinBox();
2655  zoomScaleSpinBox->setDecimals(1);
2656  zoomScaleSpinBox->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
2657  zoomScaleSpinBox->setSingleStep(0.1);
2658  zoomScaleSpinBox->setMinimum(qFloor(VMainGraphicsView::MinScale()*1000)/10.0);
2659  zoomScaleSpinBox->setMaximum(qFloor(VMainGraphicsView::MaxScale()*1000)/10.0);
2660  zoomScaleSpinBox->setSuffix("%");
2661  zoomScaleSpinBox->setMaximumWidth(80);
2662  zoomScaleSpinBox->setKeyboardTracking(false);
2663  ui->zoom_ToolBar->insertWidget(ui->zoomIn_Action,zoomScaleSpinBox);
2664 
2665  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
2666  connect(zoomScaleSpinBox, QOverload<double>::of(&QDoubleSpinBox::valueChanged),
2667  this,[this](double d){ui->view->zoomByScale(d/100.0);});
2668 
2669 }
2670 
2671 void MainWindow::initializeToolBarVisibility()
2672 {
2673  updateToolBarVisibility();
2674  connect(ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2675  {
2676  ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2677  qApp->Settings()->setShowToolsToolBar(visible);
2678  });
2679  connect(ui->points_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2680  {
2681  ui->points_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2682  qApp->Settings()->setShowPointToolBar(visible);
2683  });
2684  connect(ui->lines_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2685  {
2686  ui->lines_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2687  qApp->Settings()->setShowLineToolBar(visible);
2688  });
2689  connect(ui->curves_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2690  {
2691  ui->curves_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2692  qApp->Settings()->setShowCurveToolBar(visible);
2693  });
2694  connect(ui->arcs_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2695  {
2696  ui->arcs_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2697  qApp->Settings()->setShowArcToolBar(visible);
2698  });
2699  connect(ui->operations_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2700  {
2701  ui->operations_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2702  qApp->Settings()->setShowOpsToolBar(visible);
2703  });
2704  connect(ui->pieces_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2705  {
2706  ui->pieces_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2707  qApp->Settings()->setShowPieceToolBar(visible);
2708  });
2709  connect(ui->details_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2710  {
2711  ui->details_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2712  qApp->Settings()->setShowDetailsToolBar(visible);
2713  });
2714  connect(ui->layout_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
2715  {
2716  ui->layout_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
2717  qApp->Settings()->setShowLayoutToolBar(visible);
2718  });
2719 }
2720 
2721 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2722 /**
2723  * @brief initPenToolBar enable default color, line wight & type toolbar.
2724  */
2725 void MainWindow::initPenToolBar()
2726 {
2727  if (m_penToolBar != nullptr)
2728  {
2729  disconnect(m_penToolBar, nullptr, this, nullptr);
2730  delete m_penToolBar;
2731  }
2732  m_penToolBar = new PenToolBar(tr("Pen Toolbar"), this);
2733  m_penToolBar->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
2734  m_penToolBar->setObjectName("penToolBar");
2735  this->addToolBar(Qt::TopToolBarArea, m_penToolBar);
2736 
2737  connect(m_penToolBar, &PenToolBar::penChanged, this, &MainWindow::penChanged);
2738 }
2739 
2740 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2741 /**
2742  * @brief initPropertyEditor initialize the Properties Editor.
2743  */
2744 void MainWindow::initPropertyEditor()
2745 {
2746  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Initialize the Tool Property Editor.");
2747  if (toolProperties != nullptr)
2748  {
2749  disconnect(toolProperties, nullptr, this, nullptr);
2750  delete toolProperties;
2751  }
2752  toolProperties = new VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser(pattern, ui->toolProperties_DockWidget);
2753 
2754  connect(ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::itemClicked, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::itemClicked);
2755  connect(doc, &VPattern::FullUpdateFromFile, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::updateOptions);
2756 }
2757 
2758 /**
2759  * Called when something changed in the pen tool bar
2760  * (e.g. color, weight, or type).
2761  */
2762 void MainWindow::penChanged(Pen pen)
2763 {
2764  doc->setDefaultPen(pen);
2765 }
2766 
2767 void MainWindow::basePointChanged()
2768 {
2769  QString text = basePointComboBox->currentText();
2770  QString basePoint = QString();
2771 
2772  QRegularExpression rx(NameRegExp());
2773  if (rx.match(text).hasMatch() == false)
2774  {
2775  basePointComboBox->setStyleSheet("QComboBox {color: red;}");
2776  }
2777  else
2778  {
2779  basePointComboBox->setStyleSheet("QComboBox {color: black;}");
2780 
2781  if (!text.isEmpty() && text != tr("Default"))
2782  {
2783  basePoint = text;
2784  }
2785  }
2786 
2787  //we keep basePoint empty if default is selected
2788  doc->setDefaultBasePoint(basePoint);
2789 }
2790 
2791 void MainWindow::updateToolBarVisibility()
2792 {
2793  setToolBarVisibility(ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowToolsToolBar());
2794  setToolBarVisibility(ui->points_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowPointToolBar());
2795  setToolBarVisibility(ui->lines_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowLineToolBar());
2796  setToolBarVisibility(ui->curves_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowCurveToolBar());
2797  setToolBarVisibility(ui->arcs_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowArcToolBar());
2798  setToolBarVisibility(ui->operations_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowOpsToolBar());
2799  setToolBarVisibility(ui->pieces_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowPieceToolBar());
2800  setToolBarVisibility(ui->details_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowDetailsToolBar());
2801  setToolBarVisibility(ui->layout_ToolBar, qApp->Settings()->getShowLayoutToolBar());
2802 }
2803 
2804 void MainWindow::setToolBarVisibility(QToolBar *toolbar, bool visible)
2805 {
2806  toolbar->blockSignals(true);
2807  toolbar->setVisible(visible);
2808  toolbar->blockSignals(false);
2809 }
2810 
2811 void MainWindow::zoomScaleChanged(qreal scale)
2812 {
2813  zoomScaleSpinBox->blockSignals(true);
2814  zoomScaleSpinBox->setValue(qFloor(scale*1000)/10.0);
2815  zoomScaleSpinBox->blockSignals(false);
2816  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Value %f\n", (qreal(qFloor(scale*1000)/10.0)));
2817 }
2818 
2819 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2820 void MainWindow::zoomToSelected()
2821 {
2822  QGraphicsItem *item = qApp->getCurrentScene()->focusItem();
2823  QRectF rect;
2824 
2825  if (qApp->getCurrentScene() == draftScene)
2826  {
2827  if ((item != nullptr) && (item->type() == QGraphicsItem::UserType + static_cast<int>(Tool::BackgroundImage)))
2828  {
2829  rect = item->boundingRect();
2830  rect.translate(item->scenePos());
2831  ui->view->zoomToRect(rect);
2832  }
2833  else
2834  {
2835  ui->view->zoomToRect(doc->ActiveDrawBoundingRect());
2836  }
2837  }
2838  else if (qApp->getCurrentScene() == pieceScene)
2839  {
2840  if ((item != nullptr) && (item->type() == QGraphicsItem::UserType + static_cast<int>(Tool::Piece)))
2841  {
2842  rect = item->boundingRect();
2843  rect.translate(item->scenePos());
2844  ui->view->zoomToRect(rect);
2845  }
2846  }
2847 }
2848 
2849 void MainWindow::zoomToPrevious()
2850 {
2851  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
2852  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
2853 
2854  /*Set transform for current scene*/
2855  scene->swapTransforms();
2856  ui->view->setTransform(scene->transform());
2857  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
2858 }
2859 
2860 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2861 void MainWindow::zoomToArea(bool checked)
2862 {
2863  ui->view->zoomToAreaEnabled(checked);
2864 
2865  if (ui->zoomToArea_Action->isChecked())
2866  {
2867  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(false);
2868  }
2869 }
2870 
2871 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2872 void MainWindow::zoomPan(bool checked)
2873 {
2874  ui->view->zoomPanEnabled(checked);
2875  if (checked)
2876  {
2877  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setChecked(false);
2878  }
2879 }
2880 
2881 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2882 /**
2883  * @brief zoomToPoint show dialog for choosing a point and update the graphics view to focus on it.
2884  */
2885 void MainWindow::showZoomToPointDialog()
2886 {
2887  QStringList pointNames = draftPointNamesList();
2888 
2889  bool ok;
2890  QString pointName = QInputDialog::getItem(this, tr("Zoom to Point"), tr("Point:"), pointNames, 0, true, &ok,
2891  Qt::WindowSystemMenuHint | Qt::WindowTitleHint);
2892  if (!ok || pointName.isEmpty()) return;
2893 
2894  zoomToPoint(pointName);
2895 }
2896 
2897 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2898 /**
2899  * @brief zoomToPoint show dialog for choosing a point and update the graphics view to focus on it.
2900  * @param pointName name of to zoom into.
2901  */
2902 void MainWindow::zoomToPoint(const QString &pointName)
2903 {
2904  const QHash<quint32, QSharedPointer<VGObject> > *objects = pattern->DataGObjects();
2905  QHash<quint32, QSharedPointer<VGObject> >::const_iterator i;
2906 
2907  for (i = objects->constBegin(); i != objects->constEnd(); ++i)
2908  {
2909  QSharedPointer<VGObject> object = i.value();
2910  const quint32 objectId = object->getIdObject();
2911  const QString objectName = object->name();
2912 
2913  if (objectName == pointName)
2914  {
2915  VPointF *point = (VPointF*)object.data();
2916  ui->view->zoom100Percent();
2917  ui->view->centerOn(point->toQPointF());
2918 
2919  // show point name if it's hidden
2920  // TODO: Need to make this work with operation's and dart tools
2921  quint32 toolId = point->getIdTool();
2922  const quint32 objId = point->getIdObject();
2923  if (objId != NULL_ID)
2924  {
2925  toolId = objId;
2926  }
2927  if (VAbstractTool *tool = qobject_cast<VAbstractTool *>(VAbstractPattern::getTool(toolId)))
2928  {
2929  tool->setPointNameVisiblity(toolId, true);
2930  }
2931 
2932  // show any hiden groups containing object
2933  QMap<quint32,QString> groups = doc->getGroupsContainingItem(toolId, objectId, true);
2934  groupsWidget->showGroups(groups);
2935 
2936  // Reset combobox so same point can be selected again
2937  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(true);
2938  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setCurrentIndex(-1);
2939  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(false);
2940 
2941  return;
2942  }
2943  }
2944 }
2945 
2946 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2947 void MainWindow::initializeToolButtons()
2948 {
2949  connect(ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArrowTool);
2950 
2951  // This check helps to find missed tools
2952  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 54, "Check if all tools were connected.");
2953 
2954  connect(ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2955  this, &MainWindow::handlePointAtDistanceAngleTool);
2956  connect(ui->line_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleLineTool);
2957  connect(ui->alongLine_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleAlongLineTool);
2958  connect(ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleShoulderPointTool);
2959  connect(ui->normal_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleNormalTool);
2960  connect(ui->bisector_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleBisectorTool);
2961  connect(ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleLineIntersectTool);
2962  connect(ui->curve_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleCurveTool);
2963  connect(ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleCurveWithControlPointsTool);
2964  connect(ui->arc_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArcTool);
2965  connect(ui->spline_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleSplineTool);
2966  connect(ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleSplineWithControlPointsTool);
2967  connect(ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointOfContactTool);
2968  connect(ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton,&QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePatternPieceTool);
2969  connect(ui->internalPath_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleInternalPathTool);
2970  connect(ui->height_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleHeightTool);
2971  connect(ui->triangle_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleTriangleTool);
2972  connect(ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointIntersectXYTool);
2973  connect(ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointAlongCurveTool);
2974  connect(ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointAlongSplineTool);
2975  connect(ui->unitePieces_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleUnionTool);
2976  connect(ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handlePointAlongArcTool);
2977  connect(ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleLineIntersectAxisTool);
2978  connect(ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleCurveIntersectAxisTool);
2979  connect(ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArcIntersectAxisTool);
2980  connect(ui->layoutSettings_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleNewLayout);
2981  connect(ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2982  this, &MainWindow::handlePointOfIntersectionArcsTool);
2983  connect(ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2984  this, &MainWindow::handlePointOfIntersectionCirclesTool);
2985  connect(ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2986  this, &MainWindow::handleCurveIntersectCurveTool);
2987  connect(ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2988  this, &MainWindow::handlePointFromCircleAndTangentTool);
2989  connect(ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked,
2990  this, &MainWindow::handlePointFromArcAndTangentTool);
2991  connect(ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleArcWithLengthTool);
2992  connect(ui->trueDarts_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleTrueDartTool);
2993  connect(ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::exportDraftBlocksAs);
2994  connect(ui->group_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleGroupTool);
2995  connect(ui->rotation_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleRotationTool);
2996  connect(ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMirrorByLineTool);
2997  connect(ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMirrorByAxisTool);
2998  connect(ui->move_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMoveTool);
2999  connect(ui->midpoint_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleMidpointTool);
3000  connect(ui->exportLayout_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::exportLayoutAs);
3001  connect(ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::exportPiecesAs);
3002  connect(ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleEllipticalArcTool);
3003  connect(ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleAnchorPointTool);
3004  connect(ui->importImage_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleImportImage);
3005  connect(ui->insertNodes_ToolButton, &QToolButton::clicked, this, &MainWindow::handleInsertNodesTool);
3006 }
3007 
3008 void MainWindow::handlePointsMenu()
3009 {
3010  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Points Menu selected. \n");
3011 
3012  QMenu menu;
3013 
3014  QAction *action_PointAtDA = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/segment.png"), tr("Length and Angle") + "\tL, A");
3015  QAction *action_PointAlongLine = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/along_line.png"), tr("On Line") + "\tO, L");
3016  QAction *action_Midpoint = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/midpoint.png"), tr("Midpoint") + "\t" + tr("Shift+O, Shift+L"));
3017  QAction *action_AlongPerpendicular = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/normal.png"), tr("On Perpendicular") + "\tO, P");
3018  QAction *action_Bisector = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/bisector.png"), tr("On Bisector") + "\tO, B");
3019  QAction *action_Shoulder = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/shoulder.png"), tr("Length to Line") + "\tP, S");
3020  QAction *action_PointOfContact = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_intersect_arc_line.png"), tr("Intersect Arc and Line") + "\tA, L");
3021  QAction *action_Triangle = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/triangle.png"), tr("Intersect Axis and Triangle") + "\tX, T");
3022  QAction *action_PointIntersectXY = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_intersectxy_icon.png"), tr("Intersect XY") + "\tX, Y");
3023  QAction *action_PerpendicularPoint = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/height.png"), tr("Intersect Line and Perpendicular") + "\tL, P");
3024  QAction *action_PointIntersectAxis = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/line_intersect_axis.png"), tr("Intersect Line and Axis") + "\tL, X");
3025 
3026  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3027 
3028  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3029  {
3030  return;
3031  }
3032  else if (selectedAction == action_Midpoint)
3033  {
3034  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3035  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3036  handleMidpointTool(true);
3037  }
3038  else if (selectedAction == action_PointAtDA)
3039  {
3040  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3041  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3042  handlePointAtDistanceAngleTool(true);
3043  }
3044  else if (selectedAction == action_PointAlongLine)
3045  {
3046  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3047  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3048  handleAlongLineTool(true);
3049  }
3050  else if (selectedAction == action_AlongPerpendicular)
3051  {
3052  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3053  ui->normal_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3054  handleNormalTool(true);
3055  }
3056  else if (selectedAction == action_Bisector)
3057  {
3058  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3059  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3060  handleBisectorTool(true);
3061  }
3062  else if (selectedAction == action_Shoulder)
3063  {
3064  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3065  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3066  handleShoulderPointTool(true);
3067  }
3068  else if (selectedAction == action_PointOfContact)
3069  {
3070  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3071  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3072  handlePointOfContactTool(true);
3073  }
3074  else if (selectedAction == action_Triangle)
3075  {
3076  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3077  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3078  handleTriangleTool(true);
3079  }
3080  else if (selectedAction == action_PointIntersectXY)
3081  {
3082  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3083  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3084  handlePointIntersectXYTool(true);
3085  }
3086  else if (selectedAction == action_PerpendicularPoint)
3087  {
3088  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3089  ui->height_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3090  handleHeightTool(true);
3091  }
3092  else if (selectedAction == action_PointIntersectAxis)
3093  {
3094  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->points_Page);
3095  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3096  handleLineIntersectAxisTool(true);
3097  }
3098 }
3099 
3100 void MainWindow::handleLinesMenu()
3101 {
3102  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Lines Menu selected. \n");
3103  QMenu menu;
3104 
3105  QAction *action_Line = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/line.png"), tr("Line") + "\t" + tr("Alt+L"));
3106  QAction *action_LineIntersect = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/intersect.png"), tr("Intersect Lines") + "\tI, L");
3107 
3108  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3109 
3110  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3111  {
3112  return;
3113  }
3114  else if (selectedAction == action_Line)
3115  {
3116  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->lines_Page);
3117  ui->line_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3118  handleLineTool(true);
3119  }
3120  else if (selectedAction == action_LineIntersect)
3121  {
3122  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->lines_Page);
3123  ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3124  handleLineIntersectTool(true);
3125  }
3126 }
3127 
3128 void MainWindow::handleArcsMenu()
3129 {
3130  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Arcs Menu selected. \n");
3131  QMenu menu;
3132 
3133  QAction *action_Arc = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/arc.png"), tr("Radius and Angles") + "\t" + tr("Alt+A"));
3134  QAction *action_PointAlongArc = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/arc_cut.png"), tr("Point on Arc") + "\tO, A");
3135  QAction *action_ArcIntersectAxis = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/arc_intersect_axis.png"), tr("Intersect Arc and Axis") + "\tA, X");
3136  QAction *action_ArcIntersectArc = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_of_intersection_arcs.png"), tr("Intersect Arcs") + "\tI, A");
3137  QAction *action_CircleIntersect = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_of_intersection_circles.png"), tr("Intersect Circles") + "\t" + tr("Shift+I, Shift+C"));
3138  QAction *action_CircleTangent = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_from_circle_and_tangent.png"), tr("Intersect Circle and Tangent") + "\tC, T");
3139  QAction *action_ArcTangent = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/point_from_arc_and_tangent.png"), tr("Intersect Arc and Tangent") + "\tA, T");
3140  QAction *action_ArcWithLength = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/arc_with_length.png"), tr("Radius and Length") + "\t" + tr("Alt+Shift+A"));
3141  QAction *action_EllipticalArc = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/el_arc.png"), tr("Elliptical") + "\t" + tr("Alt+E"));
3142 
3143  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3144 
3145  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3146  {
3147  return;
3148  }
3149  else if (selectedAction == action_Arc)
3150  {
3151  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3152  ui->arc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3153  handleArcTool(true);
3154  }
3155  else if (selectedAction == action_PointAlongArc)
3156  {
3157  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3158  ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3159  handlePointAlongArcTool(true);
3160  }
3161  else if (selectedAction == action_ArcIntersectAxis)
3162  {
3163  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3164  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3165  handleArcIntersectAxisTool(true);
3166  }
3167  else if (selectedAction == action_ArcIntersectArc)
3168  {
3169  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3170  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3171  handlePointOfIntersectionArcsTool(true);
3172  }
3173  else if (selectedAction == action_CircleIntersect)
3174  {
3175  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3176  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3177  handlePointOfIntersectionCirclesTool(true);
3178  }
3179  else if (selectedAction == action_CircleTangent)
3180  {
3181  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3182  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3183  handlePointFromCircleAndTangentTool(true);
3184  }
3185  else if (selectedAction == action_ArcTangent)
3186  {
3187  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3188  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3189  handlePointFromArcAndTangentTool(true);
3190  }
3191  else if (selectedAction == action_ArcWithLength)
3192  {
3193  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3194  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3195  handleArcWithLengthTool(true);
3196  }
3197  else if (selectedAction == action_EllipticalArc)
3198  {
3199  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->arcs_Page);
3200  ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3201  handleEllipticalArcTool(true);
3202  }

3310  handleRotationTool(true);
3311  }

3317  }

3322  handleMirrorByAxisTool(true);
3323  }

3328  handleMoveTool(true);
3329  }
3330  else if (selectedAction == action_TrueDarts)

3334  handleTrueDartTool(true);
3335  }

3337  {
3338  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->operations_Page);

3343 void MainWindow::handlePieceMenu()
3344 {
3345  QMenu menu;
3346 
3347  QAction *action_Piece = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/new_detail.png"), tr("New Pattern Piece") + "\tN, P");
3348  QAction *action_AnchorPoint = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/anchor_point.png"), tr("Add AnchorPoint") + "\tA, P");
3349  QAction *action_InternalPath = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/path.png"), tr("Create Internal Path") + "\tI, N");
3350  QAction *action_InsertNodes = menu.addAction(QIcon(":/toolicon/32x32/insert_nodes_icon.png"), tr("Insert Nodes in Path") + "\tI, P");
3351 
3352  action_AnchorPoint->setEnabled(pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0);
3353  action_InternalPath->setEnabled(pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0);
3354  action_InsertNodes->setEnabled(pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0);
3355 
3356  QAction *selectedAction = menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
3357 
3358  if(selectedAction == nullptr)
3359  {
3360  return;
3361  }
3362  else if (selectedAction == action_Piece)
3363  {
3364  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3365  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3366  handlePatternPieceTool(true);
3367  }
3368  else if (selectedAction == action_AnchorPoint)
3369  {
3370  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3371  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3372  handleAnchorPointTool(true);
3373  }
3374  else if (selectedAction == action_InternalPath)
3375  {
3376  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3377  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3378  handleInternalPathTool(true);
3379  }
3380  else if (selectedAction == action_InsertNodes)
3381  {
3382  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentWidget(ui->piece_Page);
3383  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3384  handleInsertNodesTool(true);
3385  }
3386 }

3466 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3467 /**
3468  * @brief mouseMove save mouse position and show user.
3469  * @param scenePos position mouse.
3470  */
3471 void MainWindow::MouseMove(const QPointF &scenePos)
3472 {
3473  if (mouseCoordinates)
3474  {
3475  mouseCoordinates->updateCoordinates(scenePos);
3476  }
3477 }
3478 
3479 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3480 QT_WARNING_PUSH
3481 QT_WARNING_DISABLE_GCC("-Wswitch-default")
3482 /**
3483  * @brief CancelTool cancel tool.
3484  */
3485 void MainWindow::CancelTool()
3486 {
3487  // This check helps to find missed tools in the switch
3488  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 54, "Not all tools were handled.");
3489 
3490  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Canceling tool.");
3491  dialogTool.clear();
3492  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Dialog closed.");
3493 
3494  currentScene->setFocus(Qt::OtherFocusReason);
3495  currentScene->clearSelection();
3496  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr); // Hide visualization to avoid a crash
3497 
3498  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(false); //Disable Pan Zoom
3499  ui->view->zoomPanEnabled(false);
3500 
3501  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setChecked(false); //Disable Zoom to Area
3502  ui->view->zoomToAreaEnabled(false);
3503 
3504  switch (currentTool)
3505  {
3506  case Tool::Arrow:
3507  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3508  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(false);
3509  helpLabel->setText(QString(""));
3510 
3511  // Crash: using CRTL+Z while using line tool.
3512  undoAction->setEnabled(false);
3513  redoAction->setEnabled(false);
3514  VAbstractTool::m_suppressContextMenu = true;
3515  return;
3516  case Tool::BasePoint:
3517  case Tool::SinglePoint:
3518  case Tool::DoublePoint:
3519  case Tool::LinePoint:
3520  case Tool::AbstractSpline:
3521  case Tool::Cut:
3522  case Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE:
3523  case Tool::NodePoint:
3524  case Tool::NodeArc:
3525  case Tool::NodeElArc:
3526  case Tool::NodeSpline:
3527  case Tool::NodeSplinePath:
3528  case Tool::BackgroundImage:
3529  Q_UNREACHABLE(); //-V501
3530  //Nothing to do here because we can't create this tool from main window.
3531  break;
3532  case Tool::EndLine:
3533  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3534  break;
3535  case Tool::Line:
3536  ui->line_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3537  break;
3538  case Tool::AlongLine:
3539  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3540  break;
3541  case Tool::Midpoint:
3542  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3543  break;
3544  case Tool::ShoulderPoint:
3545  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3546  break;
3547  case Tool::Normal:
3548  ui->normal_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3549  break;
3550  case Tool::Bisector:
3551  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3552  break;
3553  case Tool::LineIntersect:
3554  ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3555  break;
3556  case Tool::Spline:
3557  ui->curve_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3558  break;
3559  case Tool::CubicBezier:
3560  ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3561  break;
3562  case Tool::Arc:
3563  ui->arc_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3564  break;
3565  case Tool::ArcWithLength:
3566  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3567  break;
3568  case Tool::SplinePath:
3569  ui->spline_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3570  break;
3571  case Tool::CubicBezierPath:
3572  ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3573  break;
3574  case Tool::PointOfContact:
3575  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3576  break;
3577  case Tool::Piece:
3578  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3579  break;
3580  case Tool::InternalPath:
3581  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3582  break;
3583  case Tool::Height:
3584  ui->height_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3585  break;
3586  case Tool::Triangle:
3587  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3588  break;
3589  case Tool::PointOfIntersection:
3590  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3591  break;
3592  case Tool::CutSpline:
3593  ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3594  break;
3595  case Tool::CutSplinePath:
3596  ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3597  break;
3598  case Tool::Union:
3599  ui->unitePieces_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3600  break;
3601  case Tool::CutArc:
3602  ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3603  break;
3604  case Tool::LineIntersectAxis:
3605  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3606  break;
3607  case Tool::CurveIntersectAxis:
3608  ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3609  break;
3610  case Tool::ArcIntersectAxis:
3611  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3612  break;
3613  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionArcs:
3614  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3615  break;
3616  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCircles:
3617  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3618  break;
3619  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCurves:
3620  ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3621  break;
3622  case Tool::PointFromCircleAndTangent:
3623  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3624  break;
3625  case Tool::PointFromArcAndTangent:
3626  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3627  break;
3628  case Tool::TrueDarts:
3629  ui->trueDarts_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3630  break;
3631  case Tool::Group:
3632  ui->group_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3633  break;
3634  case Tool::Rotation:
3635  ui->rotation_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3636  break;
3637  case Tool::MirrorByLine:
3638  ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3639  break;
3640  case Tool::MirrorByAxis:
3641  ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3642  break;
3643  case Tool::Move:
3644  ui->move_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3645  break;
3646  case Tool::EllipticalArc:
3647  ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3648  break;
3649  case Tool::AnchorPoint:
3650  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3651  break;
3652  case Tool::InsertNodes:
3653  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
3654  break;
3655  }
3656 
3657  // Crash: using CRTL+Z while using line tool.
3658  undoAction->setEnabled(qApp->getUndoStack()->canUndo());
3659  redoAction->setEnabled(qApp->getUndoStack()->canRedo());
3660 }
3661 
3662 QT_WARNING_POP
3663 
3664 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3665 /**
3666  * @brief handleArrowTool enable arrow tool.
3667  */
3668 void MainWindow::handleArrowTool(bool checked)
3669 {
3670  if (checked && currentTool != Tool::Arrow)
3671  {
3672  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Arrow tool.");
3673  CancelTool();
3674  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3675  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
3676  currentTool = Tool::Arrow;
3677  emit EnableItemMove(true);
3678  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
3679  VAbstractTool::m_suppressContextMenu = false;
3680 
3681  // Only true for rubber band selection
3682  emit EnableLabelSelection(true);
3683  emit EnablePointSelection(false);
3684  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
3685  emit EnableArcSelection(false);
3686  emit EnableElArcSelection(false);
3687  emit EnableSplineSelection(false);
3688  emit EnableSplinePathSelection(false);
3689  emit EnableNodeLabelSelection(true);
3690  emit EnableNodePointSelection(true);
3691  emit EnableImageSelection(true);
3692  emit enablePieceSelection(true);// Disable when done with pattern piece visualization
3693 
3694  // Hovering
3695  emit EnableLabelHover(true);
3696  emit EnablePointHover(true);
3697  emit EnableLineHover(true);
3698  emit EnableArcHover(true);
3699  emit EnableElArcHover(true);
3700  emit EnableSplineHover(true);
3701  emit EnableSplinePathHover(true);
3702  emit EnableNodeLabelHover(true);
3703  emit EnableNodePointHover(true);
3704  emit EnableImageHover(true);
3705  emit enablePieceHover(true);
3706 
3707  ui->view->allowRubberBand(true);
3708 
3709  ui->view->viewport()->unsetCursor();
3710  helpLabel->setText("");
3711  ui->view->setShowToolOptions(true);
3712  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Enabled arrow tool.");
3713  }
3714  else
3715  {
3716  ui->view->viewport()->setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor));
3717  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
3718  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
3719  }
3720 }
3721 
3722 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3723 /**
3724  * @brief keyPressEvent handle key press events.
3725  * @param event key event.
3726  */
3727 void MainWindow::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
3728 {
3729  switch (event->key())
3730  {
3731  case Qt::Key_Escape:
3732  handleArrowTool(true);
3733  break;
3734  case Qt::Key_Return:
3735  case Qt::Key_Enter:
3736  EndVisualization();
3737  break;
3738  case Qt::Key_Space:
3739  if (qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->isPanActiveSpaceKey())
3740  {
3741  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(true);
3742  }
3743  break;
3744  default:
3745  break;
3746  }
3747  QMainWindow::keyPressEvent (event);
3748 }
3749 
3750 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3751 /**
3752  * @brief keyReleaseEvent handle key press events.
3753  * @param event key event.
3754  */
3755 void MainWindow::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
3756 {
3757  switch (event->key())
3758  {
3759  case Qt::Key_Space:
3760  if (qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->isPanActiveSpaceKey())
3761  {
3762  ui->zoomPan_Action->setChecked(false);
3763  }
3764  default:
3765  break;
3766  }
3767  QMainWindow::keyReleaseEvent(event);
3768 }
3769 
3770 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3771 /**
3772  * @brief SaveCurrentScene save scene options before set another.
3773  */
3774 void MainWindow::SaveCurrentScene()
3775 {
3776  if (mode == Draw::Calculation || mode == Draw::Modeling)
3777  {
3778  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
3779  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
3780 
3781  /*Save transform*/
3782  scene->setCurrentTransform(ui->view->transform());
3783  /*Save scroll bars value for previous scene.*/
3784  QScrollBar *horScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar();
3785  scene->setHorScrollBar(horScrollBar->value());
3786  QScrollBar *verScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar();
3787  scene->setVerScrollBar(verScrollBar->value());
3788  }
3789 }
3790 
3791 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3792 /**
3793  * @brief RestoreCurrentScene restore scene options after change.
3794  */
3795 void MainWindow::RestoreCurrentScene()
3796 {
3797  VMainGraphicsScene *scene = qobject_cast<VMainGraphicsScene *>(currentScene);
3798  SCASSERT(scene != nullptr)
3799 
3800  /*Set transform for current scene*/
3801  ui->view->setTransform(scene->transform());
3802  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
3803  /*Set value for current scene scroll bar.*/
3804  QScrollBar *horScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar();
3805  horScrollBar->setValue(scene->getHorScrollBar());
3806  QScrollBar *verScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar();
3807  verScrollBar->setValue(scene->getVerScrollBar());
3808 }
3809 
3810 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3811 /**
3812  * @brief showDraftMode show draw scene.
3813  * @param checked true - button checked.
3814  */
3815 void MainWindow::showDraftMode(bool checked)
3816 {
3817  if (checked)
3818  {
3819  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(0);
3820  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Show draft scene");
3821  handleArrowTool(true);
3822 
3823  leftGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/fast_forward_left_to_right_arrow.png"));
3824  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/left_to_right_arrow.png"));
3825 
3826  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(true);
3827  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3828  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3829 
3830  SaveCurrentScene();
3831 
3832  currentScene = draftScene;
3833  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
3834  RestoreCurrentScene();
3835 
3836  mode = Draw::Calculation;
3837  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(currentBlockIndex); //restore current draft block
3838  drawMode = true;
3839 
3840  setToolsEnabled(true);
3841  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
3842 
3843  draftScene->enablePiecesMode(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getShowControlPoints());
3844  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
3845 
3846  updateViewToolbar();
3847 
3848  //ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getShowAnchorPoints());
3849  //draftScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAnchorPoints());
3850 
3851  ui->useToolColor_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getUseToolColor());
3852 
3853  ui->draft_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(currentToolBoxIndex);
3854 
3855  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
3856  {
3857  gradationHeightsLabel->setVisible(true);
3858  gradationHeights->setVisible(true);
3859  gradationSizesLabel->setVisible(true);
3860  gradationSizes->setVisible(true);
3861  }
3862  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWidget(groupsWidget);
3863  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Group Manager"));
3864  }
3865  else
3866  {
3867  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(true);
3868  }
3869 }
3870 
3871 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3872 /**
3873  * @brief showPieceMode show Piece scene.
3874  * @param checked true - button checked.
3875  */
3876 void MainWindow::showPieceMode(bool checked)
3877 {
3878  if (checked)
3879  {
3880  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(1);
3881  handleArrowTool(true);
3882 
3883  if(drawMode)
3884  {
3885  currentBlockIndex = draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex(); // Save current draftf block.
3886  drawMode = false;
3887  }
3888  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(draftBlockComboBox->count()-1); // Need to get data about all blocks.
3889 
3890  leftGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/right_to_left_arrow.png"));
3891  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/left_to_right_arrow.png"));
3892 
3893  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(false);
3894  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(true);
3895  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3896 
3897  if(!qApp->getOpeningPattern())
3898  {
3899  if (pattern->DataPieces()->count() == 0)
3900  {
3901  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Piece mode"), tr("You can't use Piece mode yet. "
3902  "Please, create at least one pattern piece."),
3903  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
3904  showDraftMode(true);
3905  return;
3906  }
3907  }
3908 
3909  patternPiecesWidget->updateList();
3910 
3911  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Show piece scene");
3912  SaveCurrentScene();
3913 
3914  currentScene = pieceScene;
3915  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
3916  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
3917  RestoreCurrentScene();
3918 
3919  if (mode == Draw::Calculation)
3920  {
3921  currentToolBoxIndex = ui->piece_ToolBox->currentIndex();
3922  }
3923  mode = Draw::Modeling;
3924  setToolsEnabled(true);
3925  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
3926 
3927  pieceScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
3928 
3929  updateViewToolbar();
3930 
3931  ui->piece_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(ui->piece_ToolBox->indexOf(ui->details_Page));
3932 
3933  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
3934  {
3935  gradationHeightsLabel->setVisible(true);
3936  gradationHeights->setVisible(true);
3937  gradationSizesLabel->setVisible(true);
3938  gradationSizes->setVisible(true);
3939  }
3940  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWidget(patternPiecesWidget);
3941  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWindowTitle(tr("Pattern Pieces"));
3942 
3943  helpLabel->setText("");
3944  }
3945  else
3946  {
3947  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(true);
3948  }
3949 }
3950 
3951 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3952 /**
3953  * @brief showLayoutMode show layout scene.
3954  * @param checked true - button checked.
3955  */
3956 void MainWindow::showLayoutMode(bool checked)
3957 {
3958  if (checked)
3959  {
3960  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(2);
3961  handleArrowTool(true);
3962 
3963  if(drawMode)
3964  {
3965  currentBlockIndex = draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex();//save current drfat block
3966  drawMode = false;
3967  }
3968  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(draftBlockComboBox->count()-1);// Need to get data about all draft blocks
3969 
3970  leftGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/right_to_left_arrow.png"));
3971  rightGoToStage->setPixmap(QPixmap("://icon/24x24/fast_forward_right_to_left_arrow.png"));
3972 
3973  ui->showDraftMode->setChecked(false);
3974  ui->pieceMode_Action->setChecked(false);
3975  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(true);
3976 
3977  QHash<quint32, VPiece> pieces;
3978  if(!qApp->getOpeningPattern())
3979  {
3980  const QHash<quint32, VPiece> *allPieces = pattern->DataPieces();
3981  if (allPieces->count() == 0)
3982  {
3983  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Layout mode"), tr("You can't use Layout mode yet. "
3984  "Please, create at least one pattern piece."),
3985  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
3986  showDraftMode(true);
3987  return;
3988  }
3989  else
3990  {
3991  QHash<quint32, VPiece>::const_iterator i = allPieces->constBegin();
3992  while (i != allPieces->constEnd())
3993  {
3994  if (i.value().isInLayout())
3995  {
3996  pieces.insert(i.key(), i.value());
3997  }
3998  ++i;
3999  }
4000 
4001  if (pieces.count() == 0)
4002  {
4003  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Layout mode"), tr("You can't use Layout mode yet. Please, "
4004  "include at least one pattern piece in layout."),
4005  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
4006  mode == Draw::Calculation ? showDraftMode(true) : showPieceMode(true);
4007  return;
4008  }
4009  }
4010  }
4011 
4012  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(-1);// Hide pattern pieces
4013 
4014  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Show layout scene");
4015 
4016  SaveCurrentScene();
4017 
4018  try
4019  {
4020  pieceList = preparePiecesForLayout(pieces);
4021  }
4022 
4023  catch (VException &exception)
4024  {
4025  pieceList.clear();
4026  QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Layout mode"),
4027  tr("You can't use Layout mode yet.") + QLatin1String(" \n") + exception.ErrorMessage(),
4028  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
4029  mode == Draw::Calculation ? showDraftMode(true) : showPieceMode(true);
4030  return;
4031  }
4032 
4033  currentScene = tempSceneLayout;
4034  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
4035  ui->view->setScene(currentScene);
4036 
4037  if (mode == Draw::Calculation)
4038  {
4039  currentToolBoxIndex = ui->layout_ToolBox->currentIndex();
4040  }
4041  mode = Draw::Layout;
4042  setToolsEnabled(true);
4043  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
4044  ui->layout_ToolBox->setCurrentIndex(ui->layout_ToolBox->indexOf(ui->layout_Page));
4045 
4046  mouseCoordinates->updateCoordinates(QPointF());
4047 
4048  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
4049  {
4050  gradationHeightsLabel->setVisible(false);
4051  gradationHeights->setVisible(false);
4052  gradationSizesLabel->setVisible(false);
4053  gradationSizes->setVisible(false);
4054  }
4055 
4056  showLayoutPages(ui->listWidget->currentRow());
4057 
4058  if (scenes.isEmpty())
4059  {
4060  ui->layoutSettings_ToolButton->click();
4061  }
4062 
4063  helpLabel->setText("");
4064  }
4065  else
4066  {
4067  ui->layoutMode_Action->setChecked(true);
4068  }
4069 }
4070 
4071 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4072 /**
4073  * @brief SaveAs save as pattern file.
4074  * @return true for successes saving.
4075  */
4076 bool MainWindow::SaveAs()
4077 {
4078  if (patternReadOnly)
4079  {
4080  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
4081  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
4082  messageBox.setText(tr("Can not save file."));
4083  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Pattern is read only."));
4084  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
4085  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
4086  messageBox.exec();
4087  return false;
4088  }
4089  QString filters(tr("Pattern files") + QLatin1String("(*.") + sm2dExt + QLatin1String(")"));
4090  QString filePath = qApp->getFilePath();
4091  QString dir;
4092  QString fileName;
4093  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
4094  if (filePath.isEmpty())
4095  {
4096  dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPatternPath();
4097  fileName = tr("pattern");
4098  }
4099  else
4100  {
4101  dir = QFileInfo(filePath).path();
4102  fileName = QFileInfo(filePath).baseName();
4103  }
4104 
4105  auto RemoveTempDir = [usedNotExistedDir, dir]()
4106  {
4107  if (usedNotExistedDir)
4108  {
4109  QDir directory(dir);
4110  directory.rmpath(".");
4111  }
4112  };
4113 
4114  QDir directory(dir);
4115  if (!directory.exists())
4116  {
4117  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
4118  }
4119 
4120  fileName = fileDialog(this, tr("Save as"),
4121  dir + QLatin1String("/") + fileName + QLatin1String(".") + sm2dExt,
4122  filters, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog, QFileDialog::AnyFile,
4123  QFileDialog::AcceptSave);
4124 
4125  if (fileName.isEmpty())
4126  {
4127  RemoveTempDir();
4128  return false;
4129  }
4130 
4131  QFileInfo fileInfo(fileName);
4132  if (fileInfo.suffix().isEmpty() && fileInfo.suffix() != sm2dExt)
4133  {
4134  fileName += QLatin1String(".") + sm2dExt;
4135  }
4136 
4137  if (fileInfo.exists() && fileName != filePath)
4138  {
4139  // Temporarily try to lock the file before saving
4140  // Also help to rewrite current read-only pattern
4141  VLockGuard<char> lock(fileName);
4142  if (!lock.IsLocked())
4143  {
4144  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s",
4145  qUtf8Printable(tr("Failed to lock. File with this name is opened in another window.")));
4146  RemoveTempDir();
4147  return false;
4148  }
4149  }
4150 
4151  // Need for restoring previous state in case of failure
4152  const bool wasModified = doc->IsModified(); // Need because SetReadOnly() will change internal state
4153  QString error;
4154  const bool result = SavePattern(fileName, error);
4155  if (result == false)
4156  {
4157  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
4158  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
4159  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Could not save file"));
4160  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
4161  messageBox.setDetailedText(error);
4162  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
4163  messageBox.exec();
4164 
4165  // Restoring previous state
4166  doc->SetModified(wasModified);
4167 
4168  RemoveTempDir();
4169  return result;
4170  }
4171 
4172  QFile::remove(qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix);
4173  m_curFileFormatVersion = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer;
4174  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr;
4175 
4176  if (fileName != filePath)
4177  {
4178  VlpCreateLock(lock, fileName);
4179  if (!lock->IsLocked())
4180  {
4181  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Failed to lock. This file already opened in another window. "
4182  "Expect collisions when running 2 copies of the program.")));
4183  RemoveTempDir();
4184  return false;
4185  }
4186  }
4187 
4188  RemoveTempDir();
4189  return result;
4190 }
4191 
4192 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4193 /**
4194  * @brief Save save pattern file.
4195  * @return true for successes saving.
4196  */
4197 bool MainWindow::Save()
4198 {
4199  if (patternReadOnly)
4200  {
4201  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
4202  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
4203  messageBox.setText(tr("Can not save file."));
4204  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Pattern is read only."));
4205  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
4206  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
4207  messageBox.exec();
4208  return false;
4209  }
4210  if (qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
4211  {
4212  return SaveAs();
4213  }
4214  else
4215  {
4216  if (m_curFileFormatVersion < VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer
4217  && not ContinueFormatRewrite(m_curFileFormatVersionStr, VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr))
4218  {
4219  return false;
4220  }
4221 
4222 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
4223  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup++; // turn checking on
4224 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
4225  const bool isFileWritable = QFileInfo(qApp->getFilePath()).isWritable();
4226 
4227  if (!isFileWritable)
4228  {
4229  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
4230  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
4231  messageBox.setText(tr("The document has no write permissions."));
4232  messageBox.setInformativeText("Do you want to change the permissions?");
4233  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Cancel);
4234  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Yes);
4235 
4236  if (messageBox.exec() == QMessageBox::Yes)
4237  {
4238  bool changed = QFile::setPermissions(qApp->getFilePath(),
4239  QFileInfo(qApp->getFilePath()).permissions() | QFileDevice::WriteUser);
4240 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
4241  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup--; // turn it off again
4242 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
4243 
4244  if (!changed)
4245  {
4246  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
4247  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
4248  messageBox.setText(tr("Cannot set permissions for %1 to writable.").arg(qApp->getFilePath()));
4249  messageBox.setInformativeText(tr("Could not save the file."));
4250  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
4251  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
4252  messageBox.exec();
4253  return false;
4254  }
4255  }
4256  else
4257  {
4258  return false;
4259  }
4260  }
4261 
4262  QString error;
4263  bool result = SavePattern(qApp->getFilePath(), error);
4264  if (result)
4265  {
4266  QFile::remove(qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix);
4267  m_curFileFormatVersion = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer;
4268  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr;
4269  }
4270  else
4271  {
4272  QMessageBox messageBox(this);
4273  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
4274  messageBox.setText(tr("Could not save the file"));
4275  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
4276  messageBox.setDetailedText(error);
4277  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
4278  messageBox.exec();
4279  }
4280  return result;
4281  }
4282 }
4283 
4284 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4285 /**
4286  * @brief Open ask user select pattern file.
4287  */
4288 void MainWindow::Open()
4289 {
4290  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Opening new file.");
4291 
4292  const QString filter = tr("Pattern files") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + valExt +
4293  QLatin1String(" *.") + sm2dExt + QLatin1String(")");
4294 
4295  //Get list last open files
4296  const QStringList files = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRecentFileList();
4297  QString dir;
4298  if (files.isEmpty())
4299  {
4300  dir = QDir::homePath();
4301  }
4302  else
4303  {
4304  //Absolute path to last open file
4305  dir = QFileInfo(files.first()).absolutePath();
4306  }
4307  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Run QFileDialog::getOpenFileName: dir = %s.", qUtf8Printable(dir));
4308 
4309  const QString filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
4310  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
4311 
4312  if (filename.isEmpty())
4313  {
4314  return;
4315  }
4316  LoadPattern(filename);
4317 }
4318 
4319 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4320 /**
4321  * @brief Clear reset to default window.
4322  */
4323 void MainWindow::Clear()
4324 {
4325  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Resetting main window.");
4326  lock.reset();
4327  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Unlocked pattern file.");
4328  showDraftMode(true);
4329  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Returned to Draft mode.");
4330  setCurrentFile(QString());
4331  pattern->Clear();
4332  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Clearing pattern.");
4333  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() && not doc->MPath().isEmpty())
4334  {
4335  watcher->removePath(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
4336  }
4337  doc->clear();
4338  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Clearing scenes.");
4339  draftScene->clear();
4340  pieceScene->clear();
4341  handleArrowTool(true);
4342  draftBlockComboBox->clear();
4343  ui->showDraftMode->setEnabled(false);
4344  ui->pieceMode_Action->setEnabled(false);
4345  ui->layoutMode_Action->setEnabled(false);
4346  ui->newDraft_Action->setEnabled(false);
4347  ui->renameDraft_Action->setEnabled(false);
4348  ui->save_Action->setEnabled(false);
4349  ui->saveAs_Action->setEnabled(false);
4350  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(false);
4351 
4352  // disable zoom actions until a pattern is loaded
4353  zoomScaleSpinBox->setEnabled(false);
4354  ui->zoomIn_Action->setEnabled(false);
4355  ui->zoomOut_Action->setEnabled(false);
4356  ui->zoomToFit_Action->setEnabled(false);
4357  ui->zoomToSelected_Action->setEnabled(false);
4358  ui->zoom100Percent_Action->setEnabled(false);
4359  ui->zoomToPrevious_Action->setEnabled(false);
4360  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setEnabled(false);
4361  ui->zoomPan_Action->setEnabled(false);
4362  ui->zoomToPoint_Action->setEnabled(false);
4363 
4364  //disable group actions
4365  ui->groups_DockWidget->setEnabled(false);
4366 
4367  //disable history menu actions
4368  ui->history_Action->setEnabled(false);
4369  ui->table_Action->setEnabled(false);
4370 
4371  ui->lastTool_Action->setEnabled(false);
4372  ui->increaseSize_Action->setEnabled(false);
4373  ui->decreaseSize_Action->setEnabled(false);
4374  ui->useToolColor_Action->setEnabled(false);
4375  ui->showPointNames_Action->setEnabled(false);
4376  ui->toggleWireframe_Action->setEnabled(false);
4377  ui->toggleControlPoints_Action->setEnabled(false);
4378  ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action->setEnabled(false);
4379  ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action->setEnabled(false);
4380  ui->toggleGrainLines_Action->setEnabled(false);
4381  ui->toggleLabels_Action->setEnabled(false);
4382  //ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action->setEnabled(false);
4383 
4384 
4385  //disable measurements menu actions
4386  ui->loadIndividual_Action->setEnabled(false);
4387  ui->loadMultisize_Action->setEnabled(false);
4388  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(false);
4389  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(false);
4390 
4391  setToolsEnabled(false);
4392 
4393  qApp->setPatternUnit(Unit::Cm);
4394  qApp->setPatternType(MeasurementsType::Unknown);
4395 
4396 #ifndef QT_NO_CURSOR
4397  QGuiApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
4398 #endif
4399  CleanLayout();
4400  pieceList.clear(); // don't move to CleanLayout()
4401  doc->clearBackgroundImageMap();
4402  qApp->getUndoStack()->clear();
4403  toolProperties->clearPropertyBrowser();
4404  toolProperties->itemClicked(nullptr);
4405 }
4406 
4407 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4408 void MainWindow::FileClosedCorrect()
4409 {
4410  WriteSettings();
4411 
4412  //File was closed correct.
4413  QStringList restoreFiles = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRestoreFileList();
4414  restoreFiles.removeAll(qApp->getFilePath());
4415  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->SetRestoreFileList(restoreFiles);
4416 
4417  // Remove autosave file
4418  QFile autofile(qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix);
4419  if (autofile.exists())
4420  {
4421  autofile.remove();
4422  }
4423  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "File %s closed correct.", qUtf8Printable(qApp->getFilePath()));
4424 }
4425 
4426 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4427 void MainWindow::fullParseFile()
4428 {
4429  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Full parsing file");
4430 
4431  toolProperties->clearPropertyBrowser();
4432  try
4433  {
4434  setGuiEnabled(true);
4435  doc->Parse(Document::FullParse);
4436  }
4437 
4438  catch (const VExceptionUndo &exception)
4439  {
4440  Q_UNUSED(exception)
4441 
4442  /* If user want undo last operation before undo we need finish broken redo operation. For those we post event
4443  * myself. Later in method customEvent call undo.*/
4444  QApplication::postEvent(this, new UndoEvent());
4445  return;
4446  }
4447 
4448  catch (const VExceptionObjectError &exception)
4449  {
4450  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error parsing file.")), //-V807
4451  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4452  setGuiEnabled(false);
4453 
4454  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4455  {
4456  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4457  }
4458  return;
4459  }
4460 
4461  catch (const VExceptionConversionError &exception)
4462  {
4463  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error can't convert value.")),
4464  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4465  setGuiEnabled(false);
4466 
4467  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4468  {
4469  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4470  }
4471  return;
4472  }
4473 
4474  catch (const VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
4475  {
4476  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error empty parameter.")),
4477  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4478  setGuiEnabled(false);
4479 
4480  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4481  {
4482  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4483  }
4484  return;
4485  }
4486 
4487  catch (const VExceptionWrongId &exception)
4488  {
4489  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error wrong id.")),
4490  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4491  setGuiEnabled(false);
4492 
4493  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4494  {
4495  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4496  }
4497  return;
4498  }
4499 
4500  catch (VException &exception)
4501  {
4502  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error parsing file.")),
4503  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4504  setGuiEnabled(false);
4505 
4506  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4507  {
4508  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4509  }
4510  return;
4511  }
4512  catch (const std::bad_alloc &)
4513  {
4514  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error parsing file (std::bad_alloc).")));
4515 
4516  setGuiEnabled(false);
4517 
4518  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4519  {
4520  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4521  }
4522  return;
4523  }
4524 
4525  QString draftBlock;
4526  if (draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex() != -1)
4527  {
4528  draftBlock = draftBlockComboBox->itemText(draftBlockComboBox->currentIndex());
4529  }
4530  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(true);
4531  draftBlockComboBox->clear();
4532 
4533  QStringList draftBlockNames = doc->getPatternPieces();
4534  draftBlockNames.sort();
4535  draftBlockComboBox->addItems(draftBlockNames);
4536 
4537  if (!drawMode)
4538  {
4539  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(draftBlockComboBox->count()-1);
4540  }
4541  else
4542  {
4543  const qint32 index = draftBlockComboBox->findText(draftBlock);
4544  if (index != -1)
4545  {
4546  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
4547  }
4548  }
4549  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(false);
4550  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(true);
4551 
4552  changeDraftBlockGlobally(draftBlock);
4553 
4554  setToolsEnabled(draftBlockComboBox->count() > 0);
4555  patternPiecesWidget->updateList();
4556 
4557  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, qApp->getSceneView());
4558  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, qApp->getSceneView());
4559 }
4560 
4561 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4562 void MainWindow::changeDraftBlockGlobally(const QString &draftBlock)
4563 {
4564  const qint32 index = draftBlockComboBox->findText(draftBlock);
4565  try
4566  {
4567  if (index != -1)
4568  { // -1 for not found
4569  changeDraftBlock(index, false);
4570  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(true);
4571  draftBlockComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
4572  draftBlockComboBox->blockSignals(false);
4573  }
4574  else
4575  {
4576  changeDraftBlock(0, false);
4577  }
4578  }
4579 
4580  catch (VExceptionBadId &exception)
4581  {
4582  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Bad id.")),
4583  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4584  setGuiEnabled(false);
4585 
4586  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4587  {
4588  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4589  }
4590  return;
4591  }
4592 
4593  catch (const VExceptionEmptyParameter &exception)
4594  {
4595  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Error empty parameter.")),
4596  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
4597  setGuiEnabled(false);
4598 
4599  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
4600  {
4601  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
4602  }
4603  return;
4604  }
4605 }
4606 
4607 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4608 void MainWindow::setGuiEnabled(bool enabled)
4609 {
4610  if (guiEnabled != enabled)
4611  {
4612  if (enabled == false)
4613  {
4614  handleArrowTool(true);
4615  qApp->getUndoStack()->clear();
4616  }
4617  setWidgetsEnabled(enabled);
4618 
4619  guiEnabled = enabled;
4620 
4621  setToolsEnabled(enabled);
4622  ui->statusBar->setEnabled(enabled);
4623  #ifndef QT_NO_CURSOR
4624  QGuiApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
4625  #endif
4626  }
4627 }
4628 
4629 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4630 /**
4631  * @brief setWidgetsEnabled enable action button.
4632  * @param enable enable value.
4633  */
4634 void MainWindow::setWidgetsEnabled(bool enable)
4635 {
4636  const bool draftStage = (mode == Draw::Calculation);
4637  const bool pieceStage = (mode == Draw::Modeling);
4638  const bool designStage = (draftStage || pieceStage);
4639  const bool layoutStage = (mode == Draw::Layout);
4640 
4641  draftBlockComboBox->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4642  ui->arrow_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4643 
4644  // enable file menu actions
4645  ui->save_Action->setEnabled(isWindowModified() && enable && not patternReadOnly);
4646  ui->saveAs_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4647  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4648 
4649  // enable edit menu actions
4650  undoAction->setEnabled(enable && designStage && qApp->getUndoStack()->canUndo());
4651  redoAction->setEnabled(enable && designStage && qApp->getUndoStack()->canRedo());
4652 
4653  // enable view menu actions
4654  ui->showDraftMode->setEnabled(enable);
4655  ui->pieceMode_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4656  ui->layoutMode_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4657  zoomScaleSpinBox->setEnabled(enable);
4658  ui->zoomIn_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4659  ui->zoomOut_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4660  ui->zoomToFit_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4661  ui->zoomToSelected_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4662  ui->zoom100Percent_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4663  ui->zoomToPrevious_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4664  ui->zoomToArea_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4665  ui->zoomPan_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4666  ui->zoomToPoint_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4667  m_zoomToPointComboBox->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4668 
4669  ui->increaseSize_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4670  ui->decreaseSize_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4671  ui->useToolColor_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4672  ui->showPointNames_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4673  ui->toggleWireframe_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4674  ui->toggleControlPoints_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4675  ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4676  ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action->setEnabled(enable && pieceStage);
4677  ui->toggleGrainLines_Action->setEnabled(enable && pieceStage);
4678  ui->toggleLabels_Action->setEnabled(enable && pieceStage);
4679  //ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4680 
4681  //enable group actions
4682  groupsWidget->setAddGroupEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4683 
4684  //enable tool menu actions
4685  ui->newDraft_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4686  ui->renameDraft_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4687 
4688  //enable measurement menu actions
4689  ui->loadIndividual_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4690  ui->loadMultisize_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4691  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4692  ui->table_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4693 
4694  //enable history menu actions
4695  ui->history_Action->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4696 
4697  //enable utilities menu actions
4698  ui->calculator_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4699  ui->decimalChart_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4700 
4701  //enable help menu
4702  ui->shortcuts_Action->setEnabled(enable);
4703 
4704  //enable dock widget actions
4705  ui->groups_DockWidget->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4706  ui->toolProperties_DockWidget->setEnabled(enable && draftStage);
4707  ui->layoutPages_DockWidget->setEnabled(enable && layoutStage);
4708  actionDockWidgetToolOptions->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4709  actionDockWidgetGroups->setEnabled(enable && designStage);
4710  actionDockWidgetLayouts->setEnabled(enable && layoutStage);
4711 
4712  //Now we don't want allow user call context menu
4713  draftScene->setToolsDisabled(!enable, doc->getActiveDraftBlockName());
4714  ui->view->setEnabled(enable);
4715 
4716 }
4717 
4718 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4719 void MainWindow::UpdateHeightsList(const QStringList &list)
4720 {
4721  QString value;
4722  if (gradationHeights->currentIndex() != -1)
4723  {
4724  value = gradationHeights->currentText();
4725  }
4726 
4727  gradationHeights->blockSignals(true);
4728  gradationHeights->clear();
4729  gradationHeights->addItems(list);
4730  gradationHeights->blockSignals(false);
4731 
4732  int index = gradationHeights->findText(value);
4733  if (index != -1)
4734  {
4735  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4736  }
4737  else
4738  {
4739  ChangedHeight(0);
4740  }
4741 }
4742 
4743 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4744 void MainWindow::UpdateSizesList(const QStringList &list)
4745 {
4746  QString value;
4747  if (gradationSizes->currentIndex() != -1)
4748  {
4749  value = gradationSizes->currentText();
4750  }
4751 
4752  gradationSizes->blockSignals(true);
4753  gradationSizes->clear();
4754  gradationSizes->addItems(list);
4755  gradationSizes->blockSignals(false);
4756 
4757  int index = gradationSizes->findText(value);
4758  if (index != -1)
4759  {
4760  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4761  }
4762  else
4763  {
4764  ChangedSize(0);
4765  }
4766 }
4767 
4768 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4769 /**
4770  * @brief NewPattern create new empty pattern.
4771  */
4772 void MainWindow::New()
4773 {
4774  if (draftBlockComboBox->count() == 0)
4775  {
4776  // Creating a new pattern design requires creating a new draft block
4777  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "New Draft Block.");
4778  QString draftBlockName = tr("Draft block %1").arg(draftBlockComboBox->count()+1);
4779  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Generated Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
4780 
4781  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "First Draft Block");
4782  DialogNewPattern newPattern(pattern, draftBlockName, this);
4783  if (newPattern.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
4784  {
4785  draftBlockName = newPattern.name();
4786  qApp->setPatternUnit(newPattern.PatternUnit());
4787  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
4788  }
4789  else
4790  {
4791  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Creating new Draft Block was canceled.");
4792  return;
4793  }
4794 
4795  //Set scene size to size scene view
4796  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, ui->view);
4797  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, ui->view);
4798 
4799  addDraftBlock(draftBlockName);
4800 
4801  mouseCoordinates = new MouseCoordinates(qApp->patternUnit());
4802  ui->statusBar->addPermanentWidget((mouseCoordinates));
4803 
4804  m_curFileFormatVersion = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVer;
4805  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = VPatternConverter::PatternMaxVerStr;
4806  }
4807  else
4808  {
4809  startNewSeamly2D();
4810  }
4811 }
4812 
4813 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4814 /**
4815  * @brief haveChange enable action save if we have unsaved change.
4816  */
4817 void MainWindow::patternChangesWereSaved(bool saved)
4818 {
4819  if (guiEnabled)
4820  {
4821  const bool state = doc->IsModified() || !saved;
4822  setWindowModified(state);
4823  not patternReadOnly ? ui->save_Action->setEnabled(state): ui->save_Action->setEnabled(false);
4824  isLayoutStale = true;
4825  }
4826 }
4827 
4828 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4829 /**
4830  * @brief ChangedSize change new size value.
4831  * @param index index of the selected item.
4832  */
4833 void MainWindow::ChangedSize(int index)
4834 {
4835  const int size = static_cast<int>(VContainer::size());
4836  if (updateMeasurements(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()),
4837  gradationSizes.data()->itemText(index).toInt(),
4838  static_cast<int>(VContainer::height())))
4839  {
4840  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
4841  emit pieceScene->DimensionsChanged();
4842  }
4843  else
4844  {
4845  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't update measurements.")));
4846 
4847  const qint32 index = gradationSizes->findText(QString().setNum(size));
4848  if (index != -1)
4849  {
4850  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4851  }
4852  else
4853  {
4854  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Couldn't restore size value.");
4855  }
4856  }
4857 }
4858 
4859 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4860 /**
4861  * @brief ChangedGrowth change new height value.
4862  * @param index index of the selected item.
4863  */
4864 void MainWindow::ChangedHeight(int index)
4865 {
4866  const int height = static_cast<int>(VContainer::height());
