4867  if (updateMeasurements(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()), static_cast<int>(VContainer::size()),
4868  gradationHeights.data()->itemText(index).toInt()))
4869  {
4870  doc->LiteParseTree(Document::LiteParse);
4871  emit pieceScene->DimensionsChanged();
4872  }
4873  else
4874  {
4875  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't update measurements.")));
4876 
4877  const qint32 index = gradationHeights->findText(QString().setNum(height));
4878  if (index != -1)
4879  {
4880  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4881  }
4882  else
4883  {
4884  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Couldn't restore height value.");
4885  }
4886  }
4887 }
4888 
4889 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4890 void MainWindow::SetDefaultHeight()
4891 {
4892  const QString defHeight = QString().setNum(doc->GetDefCustomHeight());
4893  int index = gradationHeights->findText(defHeight);
4894  if (index != -1)
4895  {
4896  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4897  }
4898  else
4899  {
4900  index = gradationHeights->findText(QString().setNum(VContainer::height()));
4901  if (index != -1)
4902  {
4903  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
4904  }
4905  }
4906  VContainer::setHeight(gradationHeights->currentText().toInt());
4907 }
4908 
4909 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4910 void MainWindow::SetDefaultSize()
4911 {
4912  const QString defSize = QString().setNum(doc->GetDefCustomSize());
4913  int index = gradationSizes->findText(defSize);
4914  if (index != -1)
4915  {
4916  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4917  }
4918  else
4919  {
4920  index = gradationSizes->findText(QString().setNum(VContainer::size()));
4921  if (index != -1)
4922  {
4923  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
4924  }
4925  }
4926  VContainer::setSize(gradationSizes->currentText().toInt());
4927 }
4928 
4929 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4930 /**
4931  * @brief setToolsEnabled enable button.
4932  * @param enable enable value.
4933  */
4934 void MainWindow::setToolsEnabled(bool enable)
4935 {
4936  bool draftTools = false;
4937  bool pieceTools = false;
4938  bool layoutTools = false;
4939 
4940  switch (mode)
4941  {
4942  case Draw::Calculation:
4943  draftTools = enable;
4944  break;
4945  case Draw::Modeling:
4946  pieceTools = enable;
4947  break;
4948  case Draw::Layout:
4949  layoutTools = enable;
4950  break;
4951  default:
4952  break;
4953  }
4954 
4955  // This check helps to find missed tools
4956  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 54, "Not all tools were handled.");
4957 
4958  //Toolbox Drafting Tools
4959  //Points
4960  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4961  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4962  ui->normal_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4963  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4964  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4965  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4966  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4967  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4968  ui->height_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4969  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4970  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4971 
4972  //Lines
4973  ui->line_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4974  ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4975 
4976  //Curves
4977  ui->curve_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4978  ui->spline_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4979  ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4980  ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4981  ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4982  ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4983  ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4984  ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4985 
4986  //Arcs
4987  ui->arc_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4988  ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4989  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4990  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4991  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4992  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4993  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4994  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4995  ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4996 
4997  //Operations
4998  ui->group_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
4999  ui->rotation_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5000  ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5001  ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5002  ui->move_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5003  ui->trueDarts_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5004  ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5005 
5006  //Piece
5007  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5008  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
5009  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
5010  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
5011 
5012  //Images
5013  ui->importImage_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools);
5014 
5015  //Details
5016  ui->unitePieces_ToolButton->setEnabled(pieceTools);
5017  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setEnabled(pieceTools);
5018 
5019  //Layout
5020  ui->layoutSettings_ToolButton->setEnabled(layoutTools);
5021 
5022  //enable Toolbox Toolbar actions
5023  ui->arrow_Action->setEnabled(enable);
5024  ui->points_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5025  ui->lines_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5026  ui->arcs_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5027  ui->curves_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5028  ui->modifications_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5029  ui->pieces_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5030  ui->details_Action->setEnabled(pieceTools);
5031  ui->layout_Action->setEnabled(layoutTools);
5032  ui->images_Action->setEnabled(layoutTools);
5033 
5034  //Menu Actions
5035  //Points
5036  ui->midpoint_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5037  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5038  ui->pointAlongLine_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5039  ui->pointAlongPerpendicular_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5040  ui->bisector_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5041  ui->pointOnShoulder_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5042  ui->pointOfContact_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5043  ui->triangle_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5044  ui->pointIntersectXY_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5045  ui->perpendicularPoint_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5046  ui->pointIntersectAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5047 
5048  //Lines
5049  ui->lineTool_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5050  ui->lineIntersect_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5051 
5052  //Curves
5053  ui->curve_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5054  ui->spline_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5055  ui->curveWithCPs_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5056  ui->splineWithCPs_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5057  ui->pointAlongCurve_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5058  ui->pointAlongSpline_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5059  ui->curveIntersectCurve_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5060  ui->splineIntersectAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5061 
5062  //Arcs
5063  ui->arcTool_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5064  ui->pointAlongArc_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5065  ui->arcIntersectAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5066  ui->arcIntersectArc_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5067  ui->circleIntersect_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5068  ui->circleTangent_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5069  ui->arcTangent_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);;
5070  ui->arcWithLength_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5071  ui->ellipticalArc_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5072 
5073  //Operations
5074  ui->group_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5075  ui->rotation_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5076  ui->mirrorByLine_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5077  ui->mirrorByAxis_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5078  ui->move_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5079  ui->trueDarts_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5080  ui->exportDraftBlocks_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5081 
5082  //Piece
5083  ui->addPiece_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5084  ui->anchorPoint_Action->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
5085  ui->internalPath_Action->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
5086  ui->images_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5087  ui->internalPath_Action->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
5088  ui->insertNodes_Action->setEnabled(draftTools & (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0));
5089 
5090  // Images
5091  ui->importImage_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5092 
5093  //Details
5094  ui->union_Action->setEnabled(pieceTools);
5095  ui->exportPieces_Action->setEnabled(pieceTools);
5096 
5097  //Layout
5098  ui->newPrintLayout_Action->setEnabled(layoutTools);
5099  ui->exportLayout_Action->setEnabled(layoutTools);
5100  ui->lastTool_Action->setEnabled(draftTools);
5101 
5102  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setEnabled(draftTools || pieceTools);
5103  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(draftTools || pieceTools);
5104  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(draftTools || pieceTools);
5105 }
5106 
5107 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5108 void MainWindow::SetLayoutModeActions()
5109 {
5110  const bool enabled = not scenes.isEmpty();
5111 
5112  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setEnabled(enabled);
5113  ui->exportAs_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
5114  ui->printPreview_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
5115  ui->printPreviewTiled_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
5116  ui->print_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
5117  ui->printTiled_Action->setEnabled(enabled);
5118 }
5119 
5120 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5121 /**
5122  * @brief MinimumScrollBar set scroll bar to minimum.
5123  */
5124 void MainWindow::MinimumScrollBar()
5125 {
5126  QScrollBar *horScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar();
5127  horScrollBar->setValue(horScrollBar->minimum());
5128  QScrollBar *verScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar();
5129  verScrollBar->setValue(verScrollBar->minimum());
5130 }
5131 
5132 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5133 /**
5134  * @brief SavePattern save pattern file.
5135  * @param fileName pattern file name.
5136  * @return true if all is good.
5137  */
5138 bool MainWindow::SavePattern(const QString &fileName, QString &error)
5139 {
5140  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Saving pattern file %s.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
5141  QFileInfo tempInfo(fileName);
5142 
5143  const QString filename = AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath());
5144  if (!filename.isEmpty() && qApp->getFilePath() != fileName)
5145  {
5146  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(fileName, filename));
5147  }
5148 
5149  const bool result = doc->SaveDocument(fileName, error);
5150  if (result)
5151  {
5152  if (tempInfo.suffix() != QLatin1String("autosave"))
5153  {
5154  setCurrentFile(fileName);
5155  helpLabel->setText(tr("File saved"));
5156  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "File %s saved.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
5157  patternChangesWereSaved(result);
5158  }
5159  }
5160  else
5161  {
5162  doc->SetMPath(filename);
5163  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
5164  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Could not save file %s. %s.", qUtf8Printable(fileName), qUtf8Printable(error));
5165  }
5166  return result;
5167 }
5168 
5169 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5170 /**
5171  * @brief AutoSavePattern start safe saving.
5172  */
5173 void MainWindow::AutoSavePattern()
5174 {
5175  if (patternReadOnly)
5176  {
5177  return;
5178  }
5179  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Autosaving pattern.");
5180 
5181  if (qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() == false && this->isWindowModified() == true)
5182  {
5183  QString autofile = qApp->getFilePath() + autosavePrefix;
5184  QString error;
5185  SavePattern(autofile, error);
5186  }
5187 }
5188 
5189 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5190 /**
5191  * @brief setCurrentFile the function is called to reset the state of a few variables when a file
5192  * is loaded or saved, or when the user starts editing a new file (in which case fileName is empty).
5193  * @param fileName file name.
5194  */
5195 void MainWindow::setCurrentFile(const QString &fileName)
5196 {
5197  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Set current name to \"%s\"", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
5198  qApp->setFilePath(fileName);
5199  doc->SetPatternWasChanged(true);
5200  emit doc->UpdatePatternLabel();
5201  qApp->getUndoStack()->setClean();
5202 
5203  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() && Application2D::isGUIMode())
5204  {
5205  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Updating recent file list.");
5206  VSettings *settings = qApp->Seamly2DSettings();
5207  QStringList files = settings->GetRecentFileList();
5208  files.removeAll(fileName);
5209  files.prepend(fileName);
5210  while (files.size() > MaxRecentFiles)
5211  {
5212  files.removeLast();
5213  }
5214 
5215  settings->SetRecentFileList(files);
5216  UpdateRecentFileActions();
5217 
5218  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Updating restore file list.");
5219  QStringList restoreFiles = settings->GetRestoreFileList();
5220  restoreFiles.removeAll(fileName);
5221  restoreFiles.prepend(fileName);
5222  settings->SetRestoreFileList(restoreFiles);
5223  }
5224 
5225  UpdateWindowTitle();
5226 }
5227 
5228 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5229 /**
5230  * @brief ReadSettings read setting for app.
5231  */
5232 void MainWindow::ReadSettings()
5233 {
5234  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Reading settings.");
5235  const VSettings *settings = qApp->Seamly2DSettings();
5236  restoreGeometry(settings->GetGeometry());
5237  restoreState(settings->GetWindowState());
5238  restoreState(settings->GetToolbarsState(), APP_VERSION);
5239 
5240  // Scene antialiasing
5241  const bool graphOutputValue = settings->GetGraphicalOutput();
5242  ui->view->setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing, graphOutputValue);
5243  ui->view->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, graphOutputValue);
5244 
5245  // Stack limit
5246  qApp->getUndoStack()->setUndoLimit(settings->GetUndoCount());
5247 
5248  // Text under tool button icon
5249  ToolBarStyles();
5250 
5251  isToolOptionsDockVisible = ui->toolProperties_DockWidget->isVisible();
5252  isGroupsDockVisible = ui->groups_DockWidget->isVisible();
5253  isLayoutsDockVisible = ui->layoutPages_DockWidget->isVisible();
5254  isToolboxDockVisible = ui->toolbox_DockWidget->isVisible();
5255 }
5256 
5257 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5258 /**
5259  * @brief WriteSettings save setting for app.
5260  */
5261 void MainWindow::WriteSettings()
5262 {
5263  showDraftMode(true);
5264 
5265  VSettings *setings = qApp->Seamly2DSettings();
5266  setings->SetGeometry(saveGeometry());
5267  setings->SetWindowState(saveState());
5268  setings->SetToolbarsState(saveState(APP_VERSION));
5269 }
5270 
5271 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5272 /**
5273  * @brief MaybeSave The function is called to save pending changes.
5274  * @return returns true in all cases, except when the user clicks Cancel.
5275  */
5276 bool MainWindow::MaybeSave()
5277 {
5278  if (this->isWindowModified() && guiEnabled)
5279  {
5280  QScopedPointer<QMessageBox> messageBox(new QMessageBox(tr("Unsaved changes"),
5281  tr("The pattern has been modified.\n"
5282  "Do you want to save your changes?"),
5283  QMessageBox::Warning, QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No,
5284  QMessageBox::Cancel, this, Qt::Sheet));
5285 
5286  messageBox->setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Yes);
5287  messageBox->setEscapeButton(QMessageBox::Cancel);
5288 
5289  messageBox->setButtonText(QMessageBox::Yes,
5290  qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() || patternReadOnly ? tr("Save...") : tr("Save"));
5291  messageBox->setButtonText(QMessageBox::No, tr("Don't Save"));
5292 
5293  messageBox->setWindowModality(Qt::ApplicationModal);
5294  messageBox->setWindowFlags(windowFlags() & ~Qt::WindowContextHelpButtonHint
5295  & ~Qt::WindowMaximizeButtonHint
5296  & ~Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint);
5297  const auto ret = static_cast<QMessageBox::StandardButton>(messageBox->exec());
5298 
5299  switch (ret)
5300  {
5301  case QMessageBox::Yes:
5302  if (patternReadOnly)
5303  {
5304  return SaveAs();
5305  }
5306  else
5307  {
5308  return Save();
5309  }
5310  case QMessageBox::No:
5311  return true;
5312  case QMessageBox::Cancel:
5313  return false;
5314  default:
5315  break;
5316  }
5317  }
5318  return true;
5319 }
5320 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5321 /**
5322  * @brief InfoUnsavedImages is called when the user imports his first image.
5323  */
5324 void MainWindow::InfoUnsavedImages(bool *firstImportImage)
5325 {
5326  if (guiEnabled)
5327  {
5328  QScopedPointer<QMessageBox> messageBox(new QMessageBox(QMessageBox::Information,
5329  tr("Images will not be saved"),
5330  tr("Please note that the images can not be saved and that they are not affected "
5331  "by the undo and redo functions in the current version of the software.\n\n"
5332  "You may want to take a screenshot of the image properties dialog before closing the software "
5333  "to be able to recreate identically the image when opening the software again."),
5334  QMessageBox::NoButton,
5335  this,Qt::Sheet));
5336 
5337  messageBox->setWindowModality(Qt::ApplicationModal);
5338  messageBox->setWindowFlags(windowFlags() & ~Qt::WindowContextHelpButtonHint
5339  & ~Qt::WindowMaximizeButtonHint
5340  & ~Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint);
5341 
5342  messageBox->exec();
5343  *firstImportImage = true;
5344  }
5345 }
5346 
5347 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5348 void MainWindow::UpdateRecentFileActions()
5349 {
5350  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Updating recent file actions.");
5351  const QStringList files = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRecentFileList();
5352  const int numRecentFiles = qMin(files.size(), static_cast<int>(MaxRecentFiles));
5353 
5354  for (int i = 0; i < numRecentFiles; ++i)
5355  {
5356  QString text = QString("&%1. %2").arg(i + 1).arg(strippedName(files.at(i)));
5357  recentFileActs[i]->setText(text);
5358  recentFileActs[i]->setData(files.at(i));
5359  recentFileActs[i]->setVisible(true);
5360  }
5361  for (int j = numRecentFiles; j < MaxRecentFiles; ++j)
5362  {
5363  recentFileActs[j]->setVisible(false);
5364  }
5365 
5366  separatorAct->setVisible(numRecentFiles > 0);
5367 }
5368 
5369 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5370 void MainWindow::createMenus()
5371 {
5372  //Add last 5 most recent projects to file menu.
5373  for (int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i)
5374  {
5375  ui->file_Menu->insertAction(ui->exit_Action, recentFileActs[i]);
5376  }
5377  separatorAct = new QAction(this);
5378  separatorAct->setSeparator(true);
5379  ui->file_Menu->insertAction(ui->exit_Action, separatorAct);
5380  UpdateRecentFileActions();
5381 
5382  //Add Undo/Redo actions to edit menu.
5383  QList<QKeySequence> undoShortcuts;
5384  undoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Z));
5385  undoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::AltModifier + Qt::Key_Backspace));
5386 
5387  undoAction = qApp->getUndoStack()->createUndoAction(this, tr("&Undo"));
5388  undoAction->setShortcuts(undoShortcuts);
5389  undoAction->setIcon(QIcon::fromTheme("edit-undo"));
5390  connect(undoAction, &QAction::triggered, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);
5391  ui->edit_Menu->addAction(undoAction);
5392  ui->edit_Toolbar->addAction(undoAction);
5393 
5394  QList<QKeySequence> redoShortcuts;
5395  redoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::Key_Y));
5396  redoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::ControlModifier + Qt::ShiftModifier + Qt::Key_Z));
5397  redoShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::AltModifier + Qt::ShiftModifier + Qt::Key_Backspace));
5398 
5399  redoAction = qApp->getUndoStack()->createRedoAction(this, tr("&Redo"));
5400  redoAction->setShortcuts(redoShortcuts);
5401  redoAction->setIcon(QIcon::fromTheme("edit-redo"));
5402  connect(redoAction, &QAction::triggered, toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);
5403  ui->edit_Menu->addAction(redoAction);
5404  ui->edit_Toolbar->addAction(redoAction);
5405 
5406  separatorAct = new QAction(this);
5407  separatorAct->setSeparator(true);
5408  ui->edit_Menu->addAction(separatorAct);
5409 
5410  AddDocks();
5411 
5412  separatorAct = new QAction(this);
5413  separatorAct->setSeparator(true);
5414  ui->view_Menu->addAction(separatorAct);
5415 
5416  QMenu *menu = new QMenu(tr("Toolbars"));
5417  ui->view_Menu->addMenu(menu);
5418 
5419  menu->addAction(ui->file_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5420  connect(ui->file_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5421  {
5422  ui->file_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5423  });
5424  menu->addAction(ui->edit_Toolbar->toggleViewAction());
5425  connect(ui->edit_Toolbar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5426  {
5427  ui->edit_Toolbar->setVisible(visible);
5428  });
5429  menu->addAction(ui->view_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5430  connect(ui->view_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5431  {
5432  ui->view_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5433  });
5434 
5435  menu->addAction(ui->mode_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5436  connect(ui->mode_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5437  {
5438  ui->mode_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5439  });
5440  menu->addAction(ui->draft_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5441  connect(ui->draft_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5442  {
5443  ui->draft_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5444  });
5445 
5446  menu->addAction(ui->zoom_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5447  connect(ui->zoom_ToolBar, &QToolBar::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5448  {
5449  ui->zoom_ToolBar->setVisible(visible);
5450  });
5451  menu->addAction(ui->tools_ToolBox_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5452  menu->addAction(ui->points_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5453  menu->addAction(ui->lines_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5454  menu->addAction(ui->curves_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5455  menu->addAction(ui->arcs_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5456  menu->addAction(ui->operations_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5457  menu->addAction(ui->pieces_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5458  menu->addAction(ui->details_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5459  menu->addAction(ui->layout_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5460  menu->addAction(ui->pointName_ToolBar->toggleViewAction());
5461 }
5462 
5463 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5464 QT_WARNING_PUSH
5465 QT_WARNING_DISABLE_GCC("-Wswitch-default")
5466 void MainWindow::LastUsedTool()
5467 {
5468  // This check helps to find missed tools in the switch
5469  Q_STATIC_ASSERT_X(static_cast<int>(Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE) == 54, "Not all tools were handled.");
5470 
5471  if (currentTool == lastUsedTool)
5472  {
5473  return;
5474  }
5475 
5476  switch (lastUsedTool)
5477  {
5478  case Tool::Arrow:
5479  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5480  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
5481  handleArrowTool(true);
5482  break;
5483  case Tool::BasePoint:
5484  case Tool::SinglePoint:
5485  case Tool::DoublePoint:
5486  case Tool::LinePoint:
5487  case Tool::AbstractSpline:
5488  case Tool::Cut:
5489  case Tool::LAST_ONE_DO_NOT_USE:
5490  case Tool::NodePoint:
5491  case Tool::NodeArc:
5492  case Tool::NodeElArc:
5493  case Tool::NodeSpline:
5494  case Tool::NodeSplinePath:
5495  case Tool::BackgroundImage:
5496  Q_UNREACHABLE(); //-V501
5497  //Nothing to do here because we can't create this tool from main window.
5498  break;
5499  case Tool::EndLine:
5500  ui->pointAtDistanceAngle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5501  handlePointAtDistanceAngleTool(true);
5502  break;
5503  case Tool::Line:
5504  ui->line_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5505  handleLineTool(true);
5506  break;
5507  case Tool::AlongLine:
5508  ui->alongLine_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5509  handleAlongLineTool(true);
5510  break;
5511  case Tool::Midpoint:
5512  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5513  handleMidpointTool(true);
5514  break;
5515  case Tool::ShoulderPoint:
5516  ui->shoulderPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5517  handleShoulderPointTool(true);
5518  break;
5519  case Tool::Normal:
5520  ui->normal_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5521  handleNormalTool(true);
5522  break;
5523  case Tool::Bisector:
5524  ui->bisector_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5525  handleBisectorTool(true);
5526  break;
5527  case Tool::LineIntersect:
5528  ui->lineIntersect_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5529  handleLineIntersectTool(true);
5530  break;
5531  case Tool::Spline:
5532  ui->curve_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5533  handleCurveTool(true);
5534  break;
5535  case Tool::CubicBezier:
5536  ui->curveWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5537  handleCurveWithControlPointsTool(true);
5538  break;
5539  case Tool::Arc:
5540  ui->arc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5541  handleArcTool(true);
5542  break;
5543  case Tool::SplinePath:
5544  ui->spline_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5545  handleSplineTool(true);
5546  break;
5547  case Tool::CubicBezierPath:
5548  ui->splineWithCPs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5549  handleSplineWithControlPointsTool(true);
5550  break;
5551  case Tool::PointOfContact:
5552  ui->pointOfContact_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5553  handlePointOfContactTool(true);
5554  break;
5555  case Tool::Piece:
5556  ui->addPatternPiece_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5557  handlePatternPieceTool(true);
5558  break;
5559  case Tool::InternalPath:
5560  ui->internalPath_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5561  handleInternalPathTool(true);
5562  break;
5563  case Tool::Height:
5564  ui->height_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5565  handleHeightTool(true);
5566  break;
5567  case Tool::Triangle:
5568  ui->triangle_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5569  handleTriangleTool(true);
5570  break;
5571  case Tool::PointOfIntersection:
5572  ui->pointIntersectXY_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5573  handlePointIntersectXYTool(true);
5574  break;
5575  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionArcs:
5576  ui->pointOfIntersectionArcs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5577  handlePointOfIntersectionArcsTool(true);
5578  break;
5579  case Tool::CutSpline:
5580  ui->pointAlongCurve_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5581  handlePointAlongCurveTool(true);
5582  break;
5583  case Tool::CutSplinePath:
5584  ui->pointAlongSpline_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5585  handlePointAlongSplineTool(true);
5586  break;
5587  case Tool::Union:
5588  ui->unitePieces_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5589  handleUnionTool(true);
5590  break;
5591  case Tool::CutArc:
5592  ui->pointAlongArc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5593  handlePointAlongArcTool(true);
5594  break;
5595  case Tool::LineIntersectAxis:
5596  ui->lineIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5597  handleLineIntersectAxisTool(true);
5598  break;
5599  case Tool::CurveIntersectAxis:
5600  ui->curveIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5601  handleCurveIntersectAxisTool(true);
5602  break;
5603  case Tool::ArcIntersectAxis:
5604  ui->arcIntersectAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5605  handleArcIntersectAxisTool(true);
5606  break;
5607  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCircles:
5608  ui->pointOfIntersectionCircles_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5609  handlePointOfIntersectionCirclesTool(true);
5610  break;
5611  case Tool::PointOfIntersectionCurves:
5612  ui->pointOfIntersectionCurves_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5613  handleCurveIntersectCurveTool(true);
5614  break;
5615  case Tool::PointFromCircleAndTangent:
5616  ui->pointFromCircleAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5617  handlePointFromCircleAndTangentTool(true);
5618  break;
5619  case Tool::PointFromArcAndTangent:
5620  ui->pointFromArcAndTangent_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5621  handlePointFromArcAndTangentTool(true);
5622  break;
5623  case Tool::ArcWithLength:
5624  ui->arcWithLength_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5625  handleArcWithLengthTool(true);
5626  break;
5627  case Tool::TrueDarts:
5628  ui->trueDarts_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5629  handleTrueDartTool(true);
5630  break;
5631  case Tool::Group:
5632  ui->group_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5633  handleGroupTool(true);
5634  break;
5635  case Tool::Rotation:
5636  ui->rotation_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5637  handleRotationTool(true);
5638  break;
5639  case Tool::MirrorByLine:
5640  ui->mirrorByLine_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5641  handleMirrorByLineTool(true);
5642  break;
5643  case Tool::MirrorByAxis:
5644  ui->mirrorByAxis_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5645  handleMirrorByAxisTool(true);
5646  break;
5647  case Tool::Move:
5648  ui->move_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5649  handleMoveTool(true);
5650  break;
5651  case Tool::EllipticalArc:
5652  ui->ellipticalArc_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5653  handleEllipticalArcTool(true);
5654  break;
5655  case Tool::AnchorPoint:
5656  ui->anchorPoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5657  handleAnchorPointTool(true);
5658  break;
5659  case Tool::InsertNodes:
5660  ui->insertNodes_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5661  handleInsertNodesTool(true);
5662  break;
5663  }
5664 }
5665 
5666 QT_WARNING_POP
5667 
5668 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5669 void MainWindow::AddDocks()
5670 {
5671  //Add dock
5672  actionDockWidgetToolOptions = ui->toolProperties_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5673  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetToolOptions);
5674  connect(ui->toolProperties_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5675  {
5676  isToolOptionsDockVisible = visible;
5677  });
5678 
5679  actionDockWidgetGroups = ui->groups_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5680  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetGroups);
5681  connect(ui->groups_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5682  {
5683  isGroupsDockVisible = visible;
5684  });
5685 
5686  actionDockWidgetLayouts = ui->layoutPages_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5687  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetLayouts);
5688  connect(ui->layoutPages_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5689  {
5690  isLayoutsDockVisible = visible;
5691  });
5692 
5693  actionDockWidgetToolbox = ui->toolbox_DockWidget->toggleViewAction();
5694  ui->view_Menu->addAction(actionDockWidgetToolbox);
5695  connect(ui->toolbox_DockWidget, &QDockWidget::visibilityChanged, this, [this](bool visible)
5696  {
5697  isToolboxDockVisible = visible;
5698  });
5699 
5700  tabifyDockWidget(ui->groups_DockWidget, ui->toolProperties_DockWidget);
5701  splitDockWidget(ui->toolProperties_DockWidget, ui->layoutPages_DockWidget, Qt::Vertical);
5702 }
5703 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5704 void MainWindow::initializeDocksContain()
5705 {
5706  setTabPosition(Qt::RightDockWidgetArea, QTabWidget::West);
5707  setTabPosition(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea, QTabWidget::East);
5708 
5709  initPropertyEditor();
5710 
5711  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Initialize Groups manager.");
5712  groupsWidget = new GroupsWidget(pattern, doc, this);
5713  ui->groups_DockWidget->setWidget(groupsWidget);
5714  connect(doc, &VAbstractPattern::updateGroups, this, &MainWindow::updateGroups);
5715 
5716  patternPiecesWidget = new PiecesWidget(pattern, doc, this);
5717  connect(doc, &VPattern::FullUpdateFromFile, patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::updateList);
5718  connect(doc, &VPattern::UpdateInLayoutList, patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::togglePiece);
5719  connect(doc, &VPattern::showPiece, patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::selectPiece);
5720  connect(patternPiecesWidget, &PiecesWidget::Highlight, pieceScene, &VMainGraphicsScene::HighlightItem);
5721  patternPiecesWidget->setVisible(false);
5722 
5723  ui->toolbox_StackedWidget->setCurrentIndex(0);
5724 }
5725 
5726 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5727 bool MainWindow::startNewSeamly2D(const QString &fileName) const
5728 {
5729  if (this->isWindowModified() || qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty() == false)
5730  {
5731  Application2D::startNewSeamly2D(fileName);
5732  return true;
5733  }
5734  return false;
5735 }
5736 
5737 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5738 void MainWindow::createActions()
5739 {
5740  ui->setupUi(this);
5741 
5742  //Files menu
5743  connect(ui->actionNew, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::New);
5744  connect(ui->actionOpen, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Open);
5745  connect(ui->save_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Save);
5746  connect(ui->saveAs_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::SaveAs);
5747  connect(ui->closePattern_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5748  {
5749  if (MaybeSave())
5750  {
5751  FileClosedCorrect();
5752  Clear();
5753  }
5754  });
5755 
5756  connect(ui->exportAs_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::exportLayoutAs);
5757  connect(ui->printPreview_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintPreviewOrigin);
5758  connect(ui->printPreviewTiled_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintPreviewTiled);
5759  connect(ui->print_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintOrigin);
5760  connect(ui->printTiled_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::PrintTiled);
5761 
5762  connect(ui->appPreferences_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::Preferences);
5763  connect(ui->patternPreferences_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5764  {
5765  DialogPatternProperties proper(doc, pattern, this);
5766  connect(&proper, &DialogPatternProperties::UpdateGradation, this, [this]()
5767  {
5768  UpdateHeightsList(MeasurementVariable::ListHeights(doc->GetGradationHeights(), qApp->patternUnit()));
5769  UpdateSizesList(MeasurementVariable::ListSizes(doc->GetGradationSizes(), qApp->patternUnit()));
5770  });
5771  proper.exec();
5772  });
5773  ui->patternPreferences_Action->setEnabled(false);
5774 
5775  //Actions for recent files loaded by a main window application.
5776  for (int i = 0; i < MaxRecentFiles; ++i)
5777  {
5778  QAction *action = new QAction(this);
5779  action->setVisible(false);
5780  recentFileActs[i] = action;
5781  connect(recentFileActs[i], &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5782  {
5783  if (QAction *action = qobject_cast<QAction*>(sender()))
5784  {
5785  const QString filePath = action->data().toString();
5786  if (!filePath.isEmpty())
5787  {
5788  LoadPattern(filePath);
5789  }
5790  }
5791  });
5792  }
5793 
5794  connect(ui->documentInfo_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5795  {
5796  ShowInfoDialog *infoDialog = new ShowInfoDialog(doc, this);
5797  infoDialog->setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose, true);
5798  infoDialog->adjustSize();
5799  infoDialog->show();
5800  });
5801 
5802  connect(ui->exit_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::close);
5803 
5804  //Edit Menu
5805  connect(ui->labelTemplateEditor_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5806  {
5807  EditLabelTemplateDialog editor(doc);
5808  editor.exec();
5809  });
5810 
5811  //View menu
5812  connect(ui->showDraftMode, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showDraftMode);
5813  connect(ui->pieceMode_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showPieceMode);
5814  connect(ui->layoutMode_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::showLayoutMode);
5815 
5816  connect(ui->toggleWireframe_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5817  {
5818  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setWireframe(checked);
5819  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5820  upDateScenes();
5821  });
5822 
5823  connect(ui->toggleControlPoints_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5824  {
5825  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowControlPoints(checked);
5826  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5827  draftScene->enablePiecesMode(checked);
5828  });
5829 
5830  connect(ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5831  {
5832  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowAxisOrigin(checked);
5833  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(checked);
5834  pieceScene->setOriginsVisible(checked);
5835  });
5836 
5837  connect(ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5838  {
5839  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowSeamAllowances(checked);
5840  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5841  refreshSeamAllowances();
5842  });
5843 
5844  connect(ui->toggleGrainLines_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5845  {
5846  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowGrainlines(checked);
5847  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5848  refreshGrainLines();
5849  });
5850 
5851  connect(ui->toggleLabels_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5852  {
5853  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowLabels(checked);
5854  emit ui->view->itemClicked(nullptr);
5855  refreshLabels();
5856  });
5857 /**
5858  connect(ui->toggleAnchorPoints_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5859  {
5860  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setShowAnchorPoints(checked);
5861  });
5862 **/
5863  connect(ui->increaseSize_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5864  {
5865  int index = qMin(fontSizeComboBox->currentIndex() + 1, fontSizeComboBox->count()-1);
5866  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
5867  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameSize(fontSizeComboBox->currentText().toInt());
5868  upDateScenes();
5869  });
5870 
5871  connect(ui->decreaseSize_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5872  {
5873  const int index = qMax(fontSizeComboBox->currentIndex() - 1, 0);
5874  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
5875  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setPointNameSize(fontSizeComboBox->currentText().toInt());
5876  upDateScenes();
5877  });
5878 
5879  connect(ui->showPointNames_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5880  {
5881  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setHidePointNames(checked);
5882  upDateScenes();
5883  });
5884 
5885  connect(ui->useToolColor_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this](bool checked)
5886  {
5887  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->setUseToolColor(checked);
5888  upDateScenes();
5889  });
5890 
5891  //Tools menu
5892  connect(ui->newDraft_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]()
5893  {
5894  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "New Draft Block.");
5895  QString draftBlockName = tr("Draft Block %1").arg(draftBlockComboBox->count()+1);
5896  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Generated Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
5897 
5898  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block count %d", draftBlockComboBox->count());
5899  draftBlockName = createDraftBlockName(draftBlockName);
5900  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block name: %s", qUtf8Printable(draftBlockName));
5901  if (draftBlockName.isEmpty())
5902  {
5903  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Draft Block name is empty.");
5904  return;
5905  }
5906 
5907  addDraftBlock(draftBlockName);
5908  });
5909

5911  connect(ui->midpoint_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, [this]
5912  {

5914  ui->midpoint_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
5915  handleMidpointTool(true);
5916  });

6227

6230  {
6231  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
6232  }
6233

6235  });
6236

6239  connect(ui->loadIndividual_Action, &QAction::triggered, this, &MainWindow::LoadIndividual);

6245  {

6247  connect(dialogTable.data(), &DialogVariables::updateProperties, toolProperties,
6248  &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);

6250  {

6252  if (dialogTable != nullptr)
6253  {

6255  }
6256  });
6257  dialogTable->show();
6258  }
6259  else
6260  {
6261  ui->table_Action->setChecked(true);
6262  dialogTable->activateWindow();
6263  }
