6358 
6359 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6360 void MainWindow::initializeAutoSave()
6361 {
6362  //Autosaving file each 1 minutes
6363  delete autoSaveTimer;
6364  autoSaveTimer = nullptr;
6365 
6366  autoSaveTimer = new QTimer(this);
6367  autoSaveTimer->setTimerType(Qt::VeryCoarseTimer);
6368  connect(autoSaveTimer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &MainWindow::AutoSavePattern);
6369  autoSaveTimer->stop();
6370 
6371  if (qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetAutosaveState())
6372  {
6373  const qint32 autoTime = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getAutosaveInterval();
6374  autoSaveTimer->start(autoTime*60000);
6375  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Autosaving every %d minutes.", autoTime);
6376  }
6377  qApp->setAutoSaveTimer(autoSaveTimer);
6378 }
6379 
6380 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6381 QString MainWindow::createDraftBlockName(const QString &text)
6382 {
6383  QInputDialog *dialog = new QInputDialog(this);
6384  dialog->setInputMode(QInputDialog::TextInput);
6385  dialog->setLabelText(tr("Name:"));
6386  dialog->setTextEchoMode(QLineEdit::Normal);
6387  dialog->setWindowTitle(tr("Draft block."));
6388  dialog->setWindowFlags(windowFlags() & ~Qt::WindowContextHelpButtonHint
6389  & ~Qt::WindowMaximizeButtonHint
6390  & ~Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint);
6391  dialog->resize(300, 100);
6392  dialog->setTextValue(text);
6393  QString draftBlockName;
6394  while (1)
6395  {
6396  const bool result = dialog->exec();
6397  draftBlockName = dialog->textValue();
6398  if (result == false || draftBlockName.isEmpty())
6399  {
6400  delete dialog;
6401  return QString();
6402  }
6403  if (draftBlockComboBox->findText(draftBlockName) == -1)
6404  {
6405  break; //exit dialog
6406  }
6407  //repeat show dialog
6408  QMessageBox messageBox;
6409  messageBox.setWindowTitle(tr("Name Exists"));
6410  messageBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
6411  messageBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Retry | QMessageBox::Cancel);
6412  messageBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Retry);
6413  messageBox.setText(tr("The action can't be completed because the Draft Block name already exists."));
6414  int boxResult = messageBox.exec();
6415 
6416  switch (boxResult)
6417  {
6418  case QMessageBox::Retry:
6419  break; // Repeat Dialog
6420  case QMessageBox::Cancel:
6421  return QString(); // Exit Dialog
6422  default:
6423  break; // should never be reached
6424  }
6425  }
6426  delete dialog;
6427  return draftBlockName;
6428 }
6429 
6430 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6431 MainWindow::~MainWindow()
6432 {
6433  CancelTool();
6434  CleanLayout();
6435 
6436  delete doc;
6437  delete ui;
6438 }
6439 
6440 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6441 /**
6442  * @brief LoadPattern open pattern file.
6443  * @param fileName name of file.
6444  */
6445 bool MainWindow::LoadPattern(const QString &fileName, const QString& customMeasureFile)
6446 {
6447  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Loading new file %s.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
6448 
6449  //We have unsaved changes or load more then one file per time
6450  if (startNewSeamly2D(fileName))
6451  {
6452  return false;
6453  }
6454 
6455  if (fileName.isEmpty())
6456  {
6457  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "New loaded filename is empty.");
6458  Clear();
6459  return false;
6460  }
6461 
6462  try
6463  {
6464  // Here comes undocumented Seamly2D's feature.
6465  // Because app bundle in Mac OS X doesn't allow setup association for SeamlyMe we must do this through Seamly2D
6466  MeasurementDoc measurements(pattern);
6467  measurements.setSize(VContainer::rsize());
6468  measurements.setHeight(VContainer::rheight());
6469  measurements.setXMLContent(fileName);
6470 
6471  if (measurements.Type() == MeasurementsType::Multisize || measurements.Type() == MeasurementsType::Individual)
6472  {
6473  const QString seamlyme = qApp->seamlyMeFilePath();
6474  const QString workingDirectory = QFileInfo(seamlyme).absoluteDir().absolutePath();
6475 
6476  QStringList arguments = QStringList() << fileName;
6477  if (isNoScaling)
6478  {
6479  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
6480  }
6481 
6482  QProcess::startDetached(seamlyme, arguments, workingDirectory);
6483  qApp->exit(V_EX_OK);
6484  return false; // stop continue processing
6485  }
6486  }
6487 
6488  catch (VException &exception)
6489  {
6490  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
6491  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6492 
6493  Clear();
6494  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
6495  {
6496  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6497  }
6498  return false;
6499  }
6500 
6501  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Locking file");
6502  VlpCreateLock(lock, fileName);
6503 
6504  if (lock->IsLocked())
6505  {
6506  qCInfo(vMainWindow, "Pattern file %s was locked.", qUtf8Printable(fileName));
6507  }
6508  else
6509  {
6510  if (!IgnoreLocking(lock->GetLockError(), fileName))
6511  {
6512  return false;
6513  }
6514  }
6515 
6516  // On this stage scene empty. Fit scene size to view size
6517  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, ui->view);
6518  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, ui->view);
6519 
6520  qApp->setOpeningPattern();//Begin opening file
6521  try
6522  {
6523  VPatternConverter converter(fileName);
6524  m_curFileFormatVersion = converter.GetCurrentFormatVarsion();
6525  m_curFileFormatVersionStr = converter.GetVersionStr();
6526  doc->setXMLContent(converter.Convert());
6527  if (!customMeasureFile.isEmpty())
6528  {
6529  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(fileName, customMeasureFile));
6530  }
6531  qApp->setPatternUnit(doc->measurementUnits());
6532  const QString path = AbsoluteMPath(fileName, doc->MPath());
6533 
6534  if (!path.isEmpty())
6535  {
6536  // Check if exist
6537  const QString newPath = checkPathToMeasurements(fileName, path);
6538  if (newPath.isEmpty())
6539  {
6540  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6541  Clear();
6542  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The measurements file '%1' could not be found.")
6543  .arg(path)));
6544  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
6545  {
6546  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6547  }
6548  return false;
6549  }
6550 
6551  if (!loadMeasurements(newPath))
6552  {
6553  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The measurements file '%1' could not be found.")
6554  .arg(newPath)));
6555  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6556  Clear();
6557  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
6558  {
6559  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6560  }
6561  return false;
6562  }
6563  else
6564  {
6565  ui->unloadMeasurements_Action->setEnabled(true);
6566  watcher->addPath(path);
6567  ui->editCurrent_Action->setEnabled(true);
6568  }
6569  }
6570 
6571  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Unknown)
6572  {// Show toolbar only if was not uploaded any measurements.
6573 
6574  initializeStatusToolBar();
6575  }
6576  }
6577 
6578  catch (VException &exception)
6579  {
6580  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("File exception.")),
6581  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6582 
6583  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6584  Clear();
6585  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
6586  {
6587  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
6588  }
6589  return false;
6590  }
6591 
6592  fullParseFile();
6593 
6594  if (guiEnabled)
6595  { // No errors occurred
6596  patternReadOnly = doc->isReadOnly();
6597  setWidgetsEnabled(true);
6598  setCurrentFile(fileName);
6599  helpLabel->setText(tr("File loaded"));
6600  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(helpLabel->text()));
6601 
6602  //Fit scene size to best size for first show
6603  zoomFirstShow();
6604  updateZoomToPointComboBox(draftPointNamesList());
6605 
6606  showDraftMode(true);
6607 
6608  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6609  return true;
6610  }
6611  else
6612  {
6613  qApp->setOpeningPattern();// End opening file
6614  return false;
6615  }
6616 }
6617 
6618 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6619 QStringList MainWindow::GetUnlokedRestoreFileList() const
6620 {
6621  QStringList restoreFiles;
6622  //Take all files that need to be restored
6623  QStringList files = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->GetRestoreFileList();
6624  if (files.size() > 0)
6625  {
6626  for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i)
6627  {
6628  // Seeking file that really needs reopen
6629  VLockGuard<char> lock(files.at(i));
6630  if (lock.IsLocked())
6631  {
6632  restoreFiles.append(files.at(i));
6633  }
6634  }
6635 
6636  // Clearing list after filtering
6637  for (int i = 0; i < restoreFiles.size(); ++i)
6638  {
6639  files.removeAll(restoreFiles.at(i));
6640  }
6641 
6642  // Clear all files that do not exist.
6643  QStringList filtered;
6644  for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i)
6645  {
6646  if (QFileInfo(files.at(i)).exists())
6647  {
6648  filtered.append(files.at(i));
6649  }
6650  }
6651 
6652  qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->SetRestoreFileList(filtered);
6653  }
6654  return restoreFiles;
6655 }
6656 
6657 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6658 void MainWindow::ToolBarStyles()
6659 {
6660  ToolBarStyle(ui->draft_ToolBar);
6661  ToolBarStyle(ui->mode_ToolBar);
6662  ToolBarStyle(ui->edit_Toolbar);
6663  ToolBarStyle(ui->zoom_ToolBar);
6664  ToolBarStyle(ui->file_ToolBar);
6665 
6666  fontComboBox->setCurrentFont(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameFont());
6667  int index = fontSizeComboBox->findData(qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getPointNameSize());
6668  fontSizeComboBox->setCurrentIndex(index);
6669 }
6670 
6671 void MainWindow::resetOrigins()
6672 {
6673  draftScene->initializeOrigins();
6674  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(true);
6675  pieceScene->initializeOrigins();
6676  pieceScene->setOriginsVisible(true);
6677 }
6678 
6679 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6680 void MainWindow::showLayoutPages(int index)
6681 {
6682  if (index < 0 || index >= scenes.size())
6683  {
6684  ui->view->setScene(tempSceneLayout);
6685  }
6686  else
6687  {
6688  ui->view->setScene(scenes.at(index));
6689  }
6690 
6691  ui->view->fitInView(ui->view->scene()->sceneRect(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
6692 }
6693 
6694 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6695 void MainWindow::Preferences()
6696 {
6697  // Calling constructor of the dialog take some time. Because of this user have time to call the dialog twice.
6698  static QPointer<DialogPreferences> guard;// Prevent any second run
6699  if (guard.isNull())
6700  {
6701  QGuiApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6702  DialogPreferences *preferences = new DialogPreferences(this);
6703  // QScopedPointer needs to be sure any exception will never block guard
6704  QScopedPointer<DialogPreferences> dialog(preferences);
6705  guard = preferences;
6706  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::WindowsLocale); // Must be first
6707  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::ToolBarStyles);
6708  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::updateToolBarVisibility);
6709  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::refreshLabels);
6710  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::resetOrigins);
6711  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::upDateScenes);
6712  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::updateViewToolbar);
6713  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::resetPanShortcuts);
6714  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, [this](){emit doc->FullUpdateFromFile();});
6715  //connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties,
6716  // toolProperties, &VToolOptionsPropertyBrowser::refreshOptions);
6717  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::initPropertyEditor);
6718  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, this, &MainWindow::initBasePointComboBox);
6719 
6720  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::resetScrollBars);
6721  connect(dialog.data(), &DialogPreferences::updateProperties, ui->view, &VMainGraphicsView::resetScrollAnimations);
6722 
6723  QGuiApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6724 
6725  if (guard->exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
6726  {
6727  initializeAutoSave();
6728  }
6729  }
6730 }
6731 
6732 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6733 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
6734 void MainWindow::CreateMeasurements()
6735 {
6736  const QString seamlyme = qApp->seamlyMeFilePath();
6737  const QString workingDirectory = QFileInfo(seamlyme).absoluteDir().absolutePath();
6738 
6739  QStringList arguments;
6740  if (isNoScaling)
6741  {
6742  arguments.append(QLatin1String("--") + LONG_OPTION_NO_HDPI_SCALING);
6743  }
6744 
6745  QProcess::startDetached(seamlyme, arguments, workingDirectory);
6746 }
6747 #endif
6748 
6749 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6750 void MainWindow::exportLayoutAs()
6751 {
6752  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6753 
6754  if (isLayoutStale)
6755  {
6756  if (ContinueIfLayoutStale() == QMessageBox::No)
6757  {
6758  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6759  return;
6760  }
6761  }
6762 
6763  try
6764  {
6765  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(scenes.size(), Draw::Layout, FileName(), this);
6766 
6767  if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
6768  {
6769  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6770  return;
6771  }
6772 
6773  ExportData(QVector<VLayoutPiece>(), dialog);
6774  }
6775 
6776  catch (const VException &exception)
6777  {
6778  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6779  qCritical("%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")),
6780  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6781  return;
6782  }
6783  ui->exportLayout_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6784 }
6785 
6786 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6787 void MainWindow::exportPiecesAs()
6788 {
6789  helpLabel->setText(QString(""));
6790 
6791  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6792  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(false);
6793  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6794 
6795  const QHash<quint32, VPiece> *allPieces = pattern->DataPieces();
6796  QHash<quint32, VPiece>::const_iterator i = allPieces->constBegin();
6797  QHash<quint32, VPiece> piecesInLayout;
6798  while (i != allPieces->constEnd())
6799  {
6800  if (i.value().isInLayout())
6801  {
6802  piecesInLayout.insert(i.key(), i.value());
6803  }
6804  ++i;
6805  }
6806 
6807  if (piecesInLayout.count() == 0)
6808  {
6809  QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Layout mode"), tr("You don't have any pieces to export. Please, "
6810  "include at least one piece in layout."),
6811  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
6812  return;
6813  }
6814 
6815  QVector<VLayoutPiece> pieceList;
6816  try
6817  {
6818  pieceList = preparePiecesForLayout(piecesInLayout);
6819  }
6820 
6821  catch (VException &exception)
6822  {
6823  QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Export pieces"),
6824  tr("Can't export pieces.") + QLatin1String(" \n") + exception.ErrorMessage(),
6825  QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Ok);
6826  return;
6827  }
6828 
6829  try
6830  {
6831  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(1, Draw::Modeling, FileName(), this);
6832  dialog.setWindowTitle("Export Pattern Pieces");
6833 
6834  if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
6835  {
6836  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6837  return;
6838  }
6839 
6840  ExportData(pieceList, dialog);
6841  }
6842 
6843  catch (const VException &exception)
6844  {
6845  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6846  qCritical("%s\n\n%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")),
6847  qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()), qUtf8Printable(exception.DetailedInformation()));
6848  return;
6849  }
6850 
6851  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6852  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
6853  ui->exportPiecesAs_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6854 }
6855 
6856 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6857 void MainWindow::exportDraftBlocksAs()
6858 {
6859  helpLabel->setText(QString(""));
6860 
6861  //select export tool button
6862  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
6863  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(false);
6864  ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6865 
6866  //Get view info so we can restore after export
6867  int vScrollBar = ui->view->verticalScrollBar()->value();
6868  int hScrollBar = ui->view->horizontalScrollBar()->value();
6869  QTransform viewTransform = ui->view->transform();
6870 
6871  //Include all items in draft scene
6872  ui->view->zoomToFit();
6873  ui->view->repaint();
6874  ui->view->zoom100Percent();
6875 
6876  // Enable all draft blocks in the scene
6877  const QList<QGraphicsItem *> items = draftScene->items();
6878  for (auto *item : items)
6879  {
6880  item->setEnabled(true);
6881  }
6882  ui->view->repaint();
6883 
6884  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(false);
6885 
6886  //Open a file dialog to save export
6887  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(1, Draw::Calculation, FileName(), this);
6888  dialog.setWindowTitle("Export Draft Blocks");
6889 
6890  if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
6891  {
6892  const QString filename = QString("%1/%2%3")
6893  .arg(dialog.path()) //1
6894  .arg(dialog.fileName()) //2
6895  .arg(ExportLayoutDialog::exportFormatSuffix(dialog.format())); //3
6896 
6897  QRectF rect;
6898  rect = draftScene->itemsBoundingRect();
6899  draftScene->update(rect);
6900  QGraphicsRectItem *paper = new QGraphicsRectItem(rect);
6901  QMarginsF margins = QMarginsF(0, 0, 0, 0);
6902 
6903  switch(dialog.format())
6904  {
6905  case LayoutExportFormat::SVG:
6906  {
6907  exportSVG(filename, paper, draftScene);
6908  break;
6909  }
6910  case LayoutExportFormat::PNG:
6911  {
6912  exportPNG(filename, draftScene);
6913  break;
6914  }
6915  case LayoutExportFormat::JPG:
6916  {
6917  exportJPG(filename, draftScene);
6918  break;
6919  }
6920  case LayoutExportFormat::BMP:
6921  {
6922  exportBMP(filename, draftScene);
6923  break;
6924  }
6925  case LayoutExportFormat::TIF:
6926  {
6927  exportTIF(filename, draftScene);
6928  break;
6929  }
6930  case LayoutExportFormat::PPM:
6931  {
6932  exportPPM(filename, draftScene);
6933  break;
6934  }
6935  case LayoutExportFormat::PDF:
6936  {
6937  exportPDF(filename, paper, draftScene, true, margins);
6938  break;
6939  }
6940  case LayoutExportFormat::PDFTiled:
6941  case LayoutExportFormat::OBJ:
6942  case LayoutExportFormat::PS:
6943  {
6944  exportPS(filename, paper, draftScene, true, margins);
6945  break;
6946  }
6947  case LayoutExportFormat::EPS:
6948  {
6949  exportEPS(filename, paper, draftScene, true, margins);
6950  break;
6951  }
6952  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1006_Flat:
6953  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1009_Flat:
6954  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1012_Flat:
6955  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1014_Flat:
6956  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1015_Flat:
6957  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1018_Flat:
6958  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1021_Flat:
6959  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1024_Flat:
6960  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1027_Flat:
6961  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1006_AAMA:
6962  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1009_AAMA:
6963  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1012_AAMA:
6964  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1014_AAMA:
6965  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1015_AAMA:
6966  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1018_AAMA:
6967  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1021_AAMA:
6968  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1024_AAMA:
6969  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1027_AAMA:
6970  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1006_ASTM:
6971  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1009_ASTM:
6972  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1012_ASTM:
6973  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1014_ASTM:
6974  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1015_ASTM:
6975  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1018_ASTM:
6976  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1021_ASTM:
6977  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1024_ASTM:
6978  case LayoutExportFormat::DXF_AC1027_ASTM:
6979  default:
6980  break;
6981  }
6982  }
6983 
6984  // Disable draft blocks in the scenee except current block
6985  doc->changeActiveDraftBlock(doc->getActiveDraftBlockName(), Document::FullParse);
6986 
6987  draftScene->setOriginsVisible(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
6988 
6989  // Restore scale, scrollbars, current active draft block
6990  ui->view->setTransform(viewTransform);
6991  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(ui->view->scene(), ui->view);
6992  zoomScaleChanged(ui->view->transform().m11());
6993 
6994  ui->view->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(vScrollBar);
6995  ui->view->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(hScrollBar);
6996 
6997  //reset tool buttons
6998  ui->arrowPointer_ToolButton->setChecked(true);
6999  ui->arrow_Action->setChecked(true);
7000  ui->exportDraftBlocks_ToolButton->setChecked(false);
7001 }
7002 
7003 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7004 void MainWindow::ReopenFilesAfterCrash(QStringList &args)
7005 {
7006  const QStringList files = GetUnlokedRestoreFileList();
7007  if (files.size() > 0)
7008  {
7009  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Reopen files after crash.");
7010 
7011  QStringList restoreFiles;
7012  for (int i = 0; i < files.size(); ++i)
7013  {
7014  QFile file(files.at(i) + autosavePrefix);
7015  if (file.exists())
7016  {
7017  restoreFiles.append(files.at(i));
7018  }
7019  }
7020 
7021  if (restoreFiles.size() > 0)
7022  {
7023  QMessageBox::StandardButton reply;
7024  const QString mes = tr("Seamly2D didn't shut down correctly. Do you want reopen files (%1) you had open?")
7025  .arg(restoreFiles.size());
7026  reply = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Reopen files."), mes, QMessageBox::Yes|QMessageBox::No,
7027  QMessageBox::Yes);
7028  if (reply == QMessageBox::Yes)
7029  {
7030  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "User said Yes.");
7031 
7032  for (int i = 0; i < restoreFiles.size(); ++i)
7033  {
7034  QString error;
7035  if (VDomDocument::SafeCopy(restoreFiles.at(i) + autosavePrefix, restoreFiles.at(i), error))
7036  {
7037  QFile autoFile(restoreFiles.at(i) + autosavePrefix);
7038  autoFile.remove();
7039  LoadPattern(restoreFiles.at(i));
7040  args.removeAll(restoreFiles.at(i));// Do not open file twice after we restore him.
7041  }
7042  else
7043  {
7044  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "Could not copy %s%s to %s %s",
7045  qUtf8Printable(restoreFiles.at(i)), qUtf8Printable(autosavePrefix),
7046  qUtf8Printable(restoreFiles.at(i)), qUtf8Printable(error));
7047  }
7048  }
7049  }
7050  }
7051  }
7052 }
7053 
7054 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7055 QString MainWindow::checkPathToMeasurements(const QString &patternPath, const QString &path)
7056 {
7057  if (path.isEmpty())
7058  {
7059  return path;
7060  }
7061 
7062  QFileInfo table(path);
7063  if (table.exists() == false)
7064  {
7065  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
7066  {
7067  return QString();// console mode doesn't support fixing path to a measurement file
7068  }
7069  else
7070  {
7071  const QString text = tr("The measurements file <br/><br/> <b>%1</b> <br/><br/> could not be found. Do you "
7072  "want to update the file location?").arg(path);
7073  QMessageBox::StandardButton result = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Loading measurements file"), text,
7074  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No,
7075  QMessageBox::Yes);
7076  if (result == QMessageBox::No)
7077  {
7078  return QString();
7079  }
7080  else
7081  {
7082  MeasurementsType patternType;
7083  if ((table.suffix() == vstExt) || (table.suffix() == smmsExt))
7084  {
7085  patternType = MeasurementsType::Multisize;
7086  }
7087  else if ((table.suffix() == vitExt) || (table.suffix() == smisExt))
7088  {
7089  patternType = MeasurementsType::Individual;
7090  }
7091  else
7092  {
7093  patternType = MeasurementsType::Unknown;
7094  }
7095 
7096  QString filename;
7097  if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
7098  {
7099  const QString filter = tr("Multisize measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smmsExt +
7100  QLatin1String(" *.") + vstExt +
7101  QLatin1String(")");
7102  //Use standard path to multisize measurements
7103  QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getMultisizePath();
7104  dir = VCommonSettings::prepareMultisizeTables(dir);
7105  filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
7106  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
7107 
7108  }
7109  else if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Individual)
7110  {
7111  const QString filter = tr("Individual measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smisExt +
7112  QLatin1String(" *.") + vitExt +
7113  QLatin1String(")");
7114  //Use standard path to individual measurements
7115  const QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getIndividualSizePath();
7116 
7117  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
7118 
7119  QDir directory(dir);
7120  if (!directory.exists())
7121  {
7122  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
7123  }
7124 
7125  filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
7126  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
7127 
7128  if (usedNotExistedDir)
7129  {
7130  QDir directory(dir);
7131  directory.rmpath(".");
7132  }
7133  }
7134  else
7135  {
7136  const QString filter = tr("Individual measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smisExt +
7137  QLatin1String(" *.") + vitExt +
7138  QLatin1String(");;") +
7139  tr("Multisize measurements") + QLatin1String(" (*.") + smmsExt +
7140  QLatin1String(" *.") + vstExt +
7141  QLatin1String(")");
7142 
7143  //Use standard path to individual measurements
7144  const QString dir = qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->getIndividualSizePath();
7145  VCommonSettings::prepareMultisizeTables(VCommonSettings::getDefaultMultisizePath());
7146 
7147  bool usedNotExistedDir = false;
7148  QDir directory(path);
7149  if (!directory.exists())
7150  {
7151  usedNotExistedDir = directory.mkpath(".");
7152  }
7153 
7154  filename = fileDialog(this, tr("Open file"), dir, filter, nullptr, QFileDialog::DontUseNativeDialog,
7155  QFileDialog::ExistingFile, QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
7156 
7157  if (usedNotExistedDir)
7158  {
7159  QDir directory(dir);
7160  directory.rmpath(".");
7161  }
7162  }
7163 
7164  if (filename.isEmpty())
7165  {
7166  return filename;
7167  }
7168  else
7169  {
7170  QScopedPointer<MeasurementDoc> measurements(new MeasurementDoc(pattern));
7171  measurements->setSize(VContainer::rsize());
7172  measurements->setHeight(VContainer::rheight());
7173  measurements->setXMLContent(filename);
7174 
7175  patternType = measurements->Type();
7176 
7177  if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Unknown)
7178  {
7179  VException exception(tr("Measurement file has unknown format."));
7180  throw exception;
7181  }
7182 
7183  if (patternType == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
7184  {
7185  MultiSizeConverter converter(filename);
7186  QString filename = converter.Convert();
7187  if (filename.contains(QLatin1String(".") + vstExt))
7188  {
7189  filename.replace(QLatin1String(".") + vstExt, QLatin1String(".") + smmsExt);
7190  QString error;
7191  const bool result = measurements->SaveDocument(filename, error);
7192  if (result)
7193  {
7194  UpdateWindowTitle();
7195  }
7196  }
7197  measurements->setXMLContent(filename);// Read again after conversion
7198  }
7199  else
7200  {
7201  IndividualSizeConverter converter(filename);
7202  QString filename = converter.Convert();
7203  if (filename.contains(QLatin1String(".") + vitExt))
7204  {
7205  filename.replace(QLatin1String(".") + vitExt, QLatin1String(".") + smisExt);
7206  QString error;
7207  const bool result = measurements->SaveDocument(filename, error);
7208  if (result)
7209  {
7210  UpdateWindowTitle();
7211  }
7212  }
7213  measurements->setXMLContent(filename);// Read again after conversion
7214  }
7215 
7216  if (!measurements->eachKnownNameIsValid())
7217  {
7218  VException exception(tr("Measurement file contains invalid known measurement(s)."));
7219  throw exception;
7220  }
7221 
7222  checkRequiredMeasurements(measurements.data());
7223 
7224  qApp->setPatternType(patternType);
7225 
7226  doc->SetMPath(RelativeMPath(patternPath, filename));
7227  patternChangesWereSaved(false);
7228  return filename;
7229  }
7230  }
7231  }
7232  }
7233  return path;
7234 }
7235 
7236 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7237 void MainWindow::changeDraftBlock(int index, bool zoomBestFit)
7238 {
7239  if (index != -1)
7240  {
7241  doc->changeActiveDraftBlock(draftBlockComboBox->itemText(index));
7242  doc->setCurrentData();
7243  emit RefreshHistory();
7244  if (drawMode)
7245  {
7246  handleArrowTool(true);
7247  if (zoomBestFit)
7248  {
7249  zoomToSelected();
7250  }
7251  }
7252  toolProperties->itemClicked(nullptr);//hide options for tool in previous pattern piece
7253  groupsWidget->updateGroups();
7254  }
7255 }
7256 
7257 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7258 void MainWindow::EndVisualization(bool click)
7259 {
7260  if (!dialogTool.isNull())
7261  {
7262  dialogTool->ShowDialog(click);
7263  }
7264 }
7265 
7266 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7267 /**
7268  * @brief zoomFirstShow Fit scene size to best size for first show
7269  */
7270 void MainWindow::zoomFirstShow()
7271 {
7272  /* If don't call zoomToFit() twice, after first scaling or moving pattern piece, scene change coordinate and whole
7273  * pattern will be moved. Looks very ugly. It is best solution that i have now.
7274  */
7275  if (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0)
7276  {
7277  showPieceMode(true);
7278  ui->view->zoomToFit();
7279  }
7280  if (!ui->showDraftMode->isChecked())
7281  {
7282  showDraftMode(true);
7283  }
7284  zoomToSelected();
7285 
7286  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(draftScene, ui->view);
7287  VMainGraphicsView::NewSceneRect(pieceScene, ui->view);
7288 
7289  if (pattern->DataPieces()->size() > 0)
7290  {
7291  showPieceMode(true);
7292  ui->view->zoomToFit();
7293  }
7294 
7295  if (!ui->showDraftMode->isChecked())
7296  {
7297  showDraftMode(true);
7298  }
7299 }
7300 
7301 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7302 void MainWindow::DoExport(const VCommandLinePtr &expParams)
7303 {
7304  const QHash<quint32, VPiece> *pieces = pattern->DataPieces();
7305  if(!qApp->getOpeningPattern())
7306  {
7307  if (pieces->count() == 0)
7308  {
7309  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("You can't export empty scene.")));
7310  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
7311  return;
7312  }
7313  }
7314  pieceList = preparePiecesForLayout(*pieces);
7315 
7316  const bool exportOnlyPieces = expParams->exportOnlyPieces();
7317  if (exportOnlyPieces)
7318  {
7319  try
7320  {
7321  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(1, Draw::Modeling, expParams->OptBaseName(), this);
7322  dialog.setDestinationPath(expParams->OptDestinationPath());
7323  dialog.selectFormat(static_cast<LayoutExportFormat>(expParams->OptExportType()));
7324  dialog.setBinaryDXFFormat(expParams->IsBinaryDXF());
7325  dialog.setTextAsPaths(expParams->isTextAsPaths());
7326 
7327  ExportData(pieceList, dialog);
7328  }
7329 
7330  catch (const VException &exception)
7331  {
7332  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")), qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()));
7333  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
7334  return;
7335  }
7336  }
7337  else
7338  {
7339  auto settings = expParams->DefaultGenerator();
7340  settings->SetTestAsPaths(expParams->isTextAsPaths());
7341 
7342  if (LayoutSettings(*settings.get()))
7343  {
7344  try
7345  {
7346  ExportLayoutDialog dialog(scenes.size(), Draw::Layout, expParams->OptBaseName(), this);
7347  dialog.setDestinationPath(expParams->OptDestinationPath());
7348  dialog.selectFormat(static_cast<LayoutExportFormat>(expParams->OptExportType()));
7349  dialog.setBinaryDXFFormat(expParams->IsBinaryDXF());
7350 
7351  ExportData(pieceList, dialog);
7352  }
7353 
7354  catch (const VException &exception)
7355  {
7356  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s\n\n%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Export exception.")), qUtf8Printable(exception.ErrorMessage()));
7357  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
7358  return;
7359  }
7360  }
7361  else
7362  {
7363  return;
7364  }
7365  }
7366 
7367  qApp->exit(V_EX_OK);
7368 }
7369 
7370 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7371 bool MainWindow::setSize(const QString &text)
7372 {
7373  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
7374  {
7375  if (this->isWindowModified() || not qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7376  {
7377  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
7378  {
7379  const int size = static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(text.toInt(), Unit::Cm, *pattern->GetPatternUnit()));
7380  const qint32 index = gradationSizes->findText(QString().setNum(size));
7381  if (index != -1)
7382  {
7383  gradationSizes->setCurrentIndex(index);
7384  }
7385  else
7386  {
7387  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7388  qUtf8Printable(tr("Not supported size value '%1' for this pattern file.").arg(text)));
7389  return false;
7390  }
7391  }
7392  else
7393  {
7394  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7395  qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set size. Need a file with multisize measurements.")));
7396  return false;
7397  }
7398  }
7399  else
7400  {
7401  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set size. File wasn't opened.")));
7402  return false;
7403  }
7404  }
7405  else
7406  {
7407  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The method %1 does nothing in GUI mode").arg(Q_FUNC_INFO)));
7408  return false;
7409  }
7410  return true;
7411 }
7412 
7413 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7414 bool MainWindow::setHeight(const QString &text)
7415 {
7416  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
7417  {
7418  if (this->isWindowModified() || not qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7419  {
7420  if (qApp->patternType() == MeasurementsType::Multisize)
7421  {
7422  const int height = static_cast<int>(UnitConvertor(text.toInt(), Unit::Cm, *pattern->GetPatternUnit()));
7423  const qint32 index = gradationHeights->findText(QString().setNum(height));
7424  if (index != -1)
7425  {
7426  gradationHeights->setCurrentIndex(index);
7427  }
7428  else
7429  {
7430  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7431  qUtf8Printable(tr("Not supported height value '%1' for this pattern file.").arg(text)));
7432  return false;
7433  }
7434  }
7435  else
7436  {
7437  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7438  qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set height. Need a file with multisize measurements.")));
7439  return false;
7440  }
7441  }
7442  else
7443  {
7444  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("Couldn't set height. File wasn't opened.")));
7445  return false;
7446  }
7447  }
7448  else
7449  {
7450  qCWarning(vMainWindow, "%s", qUtf8Printable(tr("The method %1 does nothing in GUI mode").arg(Q_FUNC_INFO)));
7451  return false;
7452  }
7453  return true;
7454 }
7455 
7456 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7457 void MainWindow::processCommandLine()
7458 {
7459  const VCommandLinePtr cmd = qApp->commandLine();
7460  auto args = cmd->OptInputFileNames();
7461 
7462  isNoScaling = cmd->IsNoScalingEnabled();
7463 
7464  if (Application2D::isGUIMode())
7465  {
7466  ReopenFilesAfterCrash(args);
7467  }
7468  else
7469  {
7470  if (args.size() != 1)
7471  {
7472  qCritical() << tr("Please, provide one input file.");
7473  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
7474  return;
7475  }
7476  }
7477 
7478  for (int i=0, sz = args.size(); i < sz; ++i)
7479  {
7480  const bool loaded = LoadPattern(args.at(static_cast<int>(i)), cmd->OptMeasurePath());
7481 
7482  if (!loaded && not Application2D::isGUIMode())
7483  {
7484  return; // process only one input file
7485  }
7486 
7487  bool hSetted = true;
7488  bool sSetted = true;
7489  if (loaded && (cmd->IsTestModeEnabled() || cmd->IsExportEnabled()))
7490  {
7491  if (cmd->IsSetGradationSize())
7492  {
7493  sSetted = setSize(cmd->OptGradationSize());
7494  }
7495 
7496  if (cmd->IsSetGradationHeight())
7497  {
7498  hSetted = setHeight(cmd->OptGradationHeight());
7499  }
7500  }
7501 
7502  if (!cmd->IsTestModeEnabled())
7503  {
7504  if (cmd->IsExportEnabled())
7505  {
7506  if (loaded && hSetted && sSetted)
7507  {
7508  DoExport(cmd);
7509  return; // process only one input file
7510  }
7511  else
7512  {
7513  qApp->exit(V_EX_DATAERR);
7514  return;
7515  }
7516  break;
7517  }
7518  }
7519  }
7520 
7521  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
7522  {
7523  qApp->exit(V_EX_OK);// close program after processing in console mode
7524  }
7525 }
7526 
7527 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7528 QString MainWindow::GetPatternFileName()
7529 {
7530  QString shownName = tr("untitled.sm2d");
7531  if(!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7532  {
7533  shownName = qApp->getFilePath();
7534  }
7535  shownName += QLatin1String("[*]");
7536  return shownName;
7537 }
7538 
7539 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7540 QString MainWindow::GetMeasurementFileName()
7541 {
7542  if(doc->MPath().isEmpty())
7543  {
7544  return "";
7545  }
7546  else
7547  {
7548  QString shownName(" - [");
7549  shownName += strippedName(AbsoluteMPath(qApp->getFilePath(), doc->MPath()));
7550 
7551  if(mChanges)
7552  {
7553  shownName += QLatin1String("*");
7554  }
7555 
7556  shownName += QLatin1String("]");
7557  return shownName;
7558  }
7559 }
7560 
7561 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7562 void MainWindow::UpdateWindowTitle()
7563 {
7564  bool isFileWritable = true;
7565  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7566  {
7567 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
7568  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup++; // turn checking on
7569 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
7570  isFileWritable = QFileInfo(qApp->getFilePath()).isWritable();
7571 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
7572  qt_ntfs_permission_lookup--; // turn it off again
7573 #endif /*Q_OS_WIN32*/
7574  }
7575 
7576  if (!patternReadOnly && isFileWritable)
7577  {
7578  setWindowTitle(VER_INTERNALNAME_STR + QString(" - ") + GetPatternFileName() + GetMeasurementFileName());
7579  }
7580  else
7581  {
7582  setWindowTitle(VER_INTERNALNAME_STR + QString(" - ") + GetPatternFileName() +
7583  GetMeasurementFileName() + QString(" - ") + tr("read only"));
7584  }
7585  setWindowFilePath(qApp->getFilePath());
7586 
7587 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
7588  static QIcon fileIcon = QIcon(QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath() +
7589  QLatin1String("/../Resources/Seamly2D.icns"));
7590  QIcon icon;
7591  if (!qApp->getFilePath().isEmpty())
7592  {
7593  if (!isWindowModified())
7594  {
7595  icon = fileIcon;
7596  }
7597  else
7598  {
7599  static QIcon darkIcon;
7600 
7601  if (darkIcon.isNull())
7602  {
7603  darkIcon = QIcon(darkenPixmap(fileIcon.pixmap(16, 16)));
7604  }
7605  icon = darkIcon;
7606  }
7607  }
7608  setWindowIcon(icon);
7609 #endif //defined(Q_OS_MAC)
7610 }
7611 
7612 void MainWindow::upDateScenes()
7613 {
7614  if (draftScene)
7615  {
7616  draftScene->update();
7617  }
7618 
7619  if (pieceScene)
7620  {
7621  pieceScene->update();
7622  }
7623 }
7624 
7625 void MainWindow::updateViewToolbar()
7626 {
7627  ui->toggleWireframe_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->isWireframe());
7628  ui->toggleControlPoints_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getShowControlPoints());
7629  ui->toggleAxisOrigin_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->getShowAxisOrigin());
7630  ui->toggleGrainLines_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->showGrainlines());
7631  ui->toggleSeamAllowances_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->showSeamAllowances());
7632  ui->toggleLabels_Action->setChecked(qApp->Settings()->showLabels());
7633 }
7634 
7635 void MainWindow::resetPanShortcuts()
7636 {
7637  QList<QKeySequence> zoomPanShortcuts;
7638  zoomPanShortcuts = ui->zoomPan_Action->shortcuts();
7639  zoomPanShortcuts.removeAll(QKeySequence(Qt::Key_Space));
7640  if (!qApp->Seamly2DSettings()->isPanActiveSpaceKey())
7641  {
7642  zoomPanShortcuts.append(QKeySequence(Qt::Key_Space));
7643  }
7644  ui->zoomPan_Action->setShortcuts(zoomPanShortcuts);
7645 }
7646 
7647 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7648 bool MainWindow::IgnoreLocking(int error, const QString &path)
7649 {
7650  QMessageBox::StandardButton answer = QMessageBox::Abort;
7651  if (Application2D::isGUIMode())
7652  {
7653  switch(error)
7654  {
7655  case QLockFile::LockFailedError:
7656  answer = QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Locking file"),
7657  tr("This file already opened in another window. Ignore if you want "
7658  "to continue (not recommended, can cause a data corruption)."),
7659  QMessageBox::Abort|QMessageBox::Ignore, QMessageBox::Abort);
7660  break;
7661  case QLockFile::PermissionError:
7662  answer = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Locking file"),
7663  tr("The lock file could not be created, for lack of permissions. "
7664  "Ignore if you want to continue (not recommended, can cause "
7665  "a data corruption)."),
7666  QMessageBox::Abort|QMessageBox::Ignore, QMessageBox::Abort);
7667  break;
7668  case QLockFile::UnknownError:
7669  answer = QMessageBox::question(this, tr("Locking file"),
7670  tr("Unknown error happened, for instance a full partition prevented "
7671  "writing out the lock file. Ignore if you want to continue (not "
7672  "recommended, can cause a data corruption)."),
7673  QMessageBox::Abort|QMessageBox::Ignore, QMessageBox::Abort);
7674  break;
7675  default:
7676  answer = QMessageBox::Abort;
7677  break;
7678  }
7679  }
7680 
7681  if (answer == QMessageBox::Abort)
7682  {
7683  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Failed to lock %s", qUtf8Printable(path));
7684  qCDebug(vMainWindow, "Error type: %d", error);
7685  Clear();
7686  if (!Application2D::isGUIMode())
7687  {
7688  switch(error)
7689  {
7690  case QLockFile::LockFailedError:
7691  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7692  qUtf8Printable(tr("This file already opened in another window.")));
7693  break;
7694  case QLockFile::PermissionError:
7695  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7696  qUtf8Printable(tr("The lock file could not be created, for lack of permissions.")));
7697  break;
7698  case QLockFile::UnknownError:
7699  qCCritical(vMainWindow, "%s",
7700  qUtf8Printable(tr("Unknown error happened, for instance a full partition prevented "
7701  "writing out the lock file.")));
7702  break;
7703  default:
7704  break;
7705  }
7706 
7707  qApp->exit(V_EX_NOINPUT);
7708  }
7709  return false;
7710  }
7711  return true;
7712 }
7713 
7714 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7715 /**
7716  * @brief draftPointNamesList gets the list of points in draft mode.
7717  */
7718 QStringList MainWindow::draftPointNamesList()
7719 {
7720  QStringList pointNames;
7721  for (QHash<quint32, QSharedPointer<VGObject>>::const_iterator item = pattern->DataGObjects()->begin();
7722  item != pattern->DataGObjects()->end();
7723  ++item)
7724  {
7725  if (item.value()->getType() == GOType::Point && !pointNames.contains(item.value()->name()))
7726  pointNames << item.value()->name();
7727  }
7728  pointNames.sort();
7729  pointNames.removeDuplicates();
7730  return pointNames;
7731 }
7732 
7733 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7734 /**
7735  * @brief updateZoomToPointComboBox updates the list of points included in the toolbar combobox.
7736  */
7737 void MainWindow::updateZoomToPointComboBox(QStringList namesList)
7738 {
7739  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(true); // prevent this UI update from zooming to the first point
7740  m_zoomToPointComboBox->clear();
7741  m_zoomToPointComboBox->addItems(namesList);
7742  m_zoomToPointComboBox->blockSignals(false);
7743 }
7744 
7745 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7746 void MainWindow::ToolSelectPoint() const
7747 {
7748  // Only true for rubber band selection
7749  emit EnableLabelSelection(false);
7750  emit EnablePointSelection(false);
7751  emit EnableLineSelection(false);
7752  emit EnableArcSelection(false);
7753  emit EnableElArcSelection(false);
7754  emit EnableSplineSelection(false);
7755  emit EnableSplinePathSelection(false);
7756  emit EnableImageSelection(false);
7757 
7758  // Hovering
7759  emit EnableLabelHover(true);
7760  emit EnablePointHover(true);
7761  emit EnableLineHover(false);
7762  emit EnableArcHover(false);
7763  emit EnableElArcHover(false);
7764  emit EnableSplineHover(false);
7765  emit EnableSplinePathHover(false);
7766  emit EnableImageHover(false);
7767 
7768  ui->view->allowRubberBand(false);
7769 }
7770

7999

8002  emit EnableNodePointHover(true);
8003  emit enablePieceHover(true);
8004 
8005  emit ItemsSelection(SelectionType::ByMouseRelease);
8006 
8007  ui->view->allowRubberBand(false);
8008 }
